issues.title: Versioning GA: Make Pinned Version Optional when setting Pinned Override on already-pinned workflow
issues.author: carlydf
issues.summary: Make the pinned version parameter optional when setting a pinned override on an already-pinned workflow, aligning with API semantics from the temporal/api repository.

issues.title: Versioning + Priority and Fairness: Expose TaskQueueStats and TaskQueueConfig in DescribeTaskQueue, likely deprecate DescribeTaskQueueEnhanced
issues.author: carlydf
issues.summary: DescribeTaskQueueEnhanced should be deprecated as it uses deprecated gRPC fields. DescribeTaskQueue should be enhanced to accept struct-based input parameters (ReportStats and ReportConfig) and expose TaskQueueStats and TaskQueueConfig in responses.

issues.title: Versioning GA: Expose Backlog Stats in DescribeVersion request and response
issues.author: carlydf
issues.summary: Add backlog stats exposure in the DescribeVersion request and response to enable per-version backlog statistics queries via the API.

issues.title: Versioning: Expose Upgrade-on-CaN option and ContinueAsNewSuggestedReasons
issues.author: carlydf
issues.summary: Expose the Upgrade-on-CaN option and ContinueAsNewSuggestedReasons API to enable trampolining and upgrade-on-CaN support in the Go SDK.

issues.title: Versioning GA: Expose RoutingConfigUpdateState in VersionInfo
issues.author: carlydf
issues.summary: Users need visibility into the status of routing configuration propagation after calling SetCurrentVersion and SetRampingVersion. This allows them to wait before starting workflows or write reliable tests.

issues.title: Update datadog go integration to v2
issues.author: 719media
issues.summary: Datadog Go integration is using outdated v1.58.1. This feature request asks to update it to the latest v2.5.0 to leverage current functionality and improvements.

issues.title: Stop sending null search attribute values on workflow start and continue as new
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Stop sending null search attribute values when starting workflows or using continue as new. Null values can be produced by upsert search attributes being stored in workflow info and then reused, creating unwanted null entries in new workflows.

issues.title: Activity Alias Collision in Test Environment When Using Anonymous Functions
issues.author: autocracy
issues.summary: Anonymous functions used in activity registration cause alias collisions in the test environment, where multiple packages register activities with the same short function name (e.g., 'func1'), resulting in local activities being incorrectly routed to unrelated registered activity mocks and causing panics.

issues.title: OpenTelemetry incorrect metric type for Counter
issues.author: LaurynasKatkus
issues.summary: OpenTelemetry metrics handler incorrectly implements Counter metrics as UpDownCounter instead of Counter, causing them to be exposed as Gauge instead of Counter with _total suffix in Prometheus, violating the OpenMetrics specification.

issues.title: Understanding the Worker Slots Gauge
issues.author: davidlbudiman
issues.summary: User seeks clarification on understanding and interpreting the Worker slots gauge in DataDog metrics, specifically what the gauge value represents and how MaxConcurrentWorkflowTaskExecutionSize affects workflow throughput.

issues.title: Configurable minRPCTimeout for activity worker instead of using MaxHeartbeatThrottleInterval for RPC timeout. And allow retry manually when network error..
issues.author: ganlvtech
issues.summary: Activity worker uses MaxHeartbeatThrottleInterval to control both heartbeat throttling and RPC timeout, but these concerns should be independent. Users need configurable minRPCTimeout and the ability to manually retry heartbeats on network errors without triggering activity cancellation.

issues.title: `TEMPORAL_LOG_LEVEL` variable
issues.author: jpds
issues.summary: User requests an environment variable `TEMPORAL_LOG_LEVEL` to control SDK log level without modifying code. SDK maintainer clarified that the SDK cannot control user-provided loggers and users should implement their own environment variable handling.

issues.title: Support non-workflow activities
issues.author: maciejdudko
issues.summary: Request to support executing activities outside of workflow context. Workers and clients need new capabilities to start, manage, and retrieve activity results without requiring a workflow, pending new server APIs.

issues.title: [api-go] Proxy: allow payload visitor to run in parallel
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to enable parallel execution of payload visitors in the api-go proxy with configurable concurrency control, while maintaining backward compatibility with sequential processing as the default.

issues.title: Set GrpcMessageTooLarge as failure_reason for workflow task failed metric
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to set GrpcMessageTooLarge as a failure_reason for workflow task failed metric in the Go SDK, referenced from a features issue.

issues.title: workflow_completed and workflow_continue_as_new counters should be logged after a successful reporting to the server
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Workflow completion and continue-as-new counters should be incremented only after successful reporting to the server, not before. This ensures accurate metrics and consistency with server state.

issues.title: MutableSideEffect in test framework ignores cmp function
issues.author: no-life
issues.summary: The MutableSideEffect function in the Go SDK's test framework ignores the custom comparison function (cmp), always updating the value instead of respecting the comparison logic. This causes test workflows to behave differently than production.

issues.title: Allow overriding of the Worker Deployment Version when invoking a Child Workflow
issues.author: chris-olszewski
issues.summary: Users request the ability to override the Worker Deployment Version when invoking a Child Workflow, similar to the functionality available when creating a Workflow from a client. This feature is needed for pre-deployment testing scenarios.

issues.title: Panic in temporal unit test framework.
issues.author: jupudibhaskar967
issues.summary: Test framework panics intermittently when executing workflows with 500 child workflow executions in a unit test, causing flaky test failures. The panic occurs in the internal workflow test suite callback processing.

issues.title: Poller Autoscaling can't scale past InitialNumberOfPollers
issues.author: jjaegerman
issues.summary: Poller autoscaling fails to increase the number of concurrent pollers beyond InitialNumberOfPollers even when computational resources, worker slots, and task queue backlog are available. This prevents workers from scaling up to handle increased load.

issues.title: Cosmetic bug in logger
issues.author: billrich2001
issues.summary: TraceID and SpanID fields in OpenTelemetry logs are printed as byte arrays instead of human-readable strings due to missing String() conversion in the logger.

issues.title: Feature Request: WorkflowRun function to get input
issues.author: erik-ringsmuth
issues.summary: Feature request to add a method on the WorkflowRun interface to retrieve the input that started a workflow execution. Currently, WorkflowRun only supports getting the result, not the input parameters.

issues.title: Feature Request: WorkflowRun GetWithOptions() option to populate valuePtr for failed run
issues.author: erik-ringsmuth
issues.summary: User requests an option for WorkflowRun.GetWithOptions() to populate the result value even when the workflow fails with an error, rather than having to choose between getting the error or the result.

issues.title: Update ChildWorkflowOptions comment to indicate the default WorkflowIDReusePolicy and WorkflowIdConflictPolicy
issues.author: codemonkeycxy
issues.summary: Documentation request to add inline comments in ChildWorkflowOptions clarifying the default values for WorkflowIDReusePolicy and WorkflowIdConflictPolicy, as these defaults are not currently clear from reading the SDK code.

issues.title: Feature Request: Add Context to MetricsHandler for Exemplar Support
issues.author: VinayBhupelliAPT
issues.summary: Feature request to add context parameter to MetricsHandler interface to enable OpenTelemetry exemplar support, allowing metrics to link directly to traces for improved observability and debugging.

issues.title: Worker Heartbeating
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Implement worker heartbeating functionality in the Go SDK by creating a background nexus worker to send periodic heartbeats, following the design patterns established in sdk-core.

issues.title: go.temporal.io/sdk/contrib/envconfig docs mention wrong path
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Documentation for the envconfig package incorrectly references `[os.UserConfigDir]/temporal/temporal.toml` when it should be `[os.UserConfigDir]/temporalio/temporal.toml`. This path discrepancy in multiple places could mislead users on where to place configuration files.

issues.title: Starting a child workflow in tests leaks goroutines
issues.author: mbark
issues.summary: Child workflows started in tests leak goroutines that don't terminate after the workflow completes, causing test frameworks like goleak to fail when verifying no goroutines are left running.

issues.title: Add resource tuner metrics
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Add resource tuner metrics for CPU and memory usage tracking in the Go SDK, matching the metrics available in Core and Java SDKs. These metrics help monitor resource slot usage and allocation during workflow execution.

issues.title: [go] Plugin + SimplePlugin
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Implement a Plugin system for the Go SDK to enable users to self-serve creating integrations with Temporal Workflows, similar to the existing Python implementation.

issues.title: Add support for firstExecutionRunId to cancel and terminate
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add support for firstExecutionRunId parameter to cancel and terminate methods in the Go SDK, allowing users to target specific workflow execution chains.

issues.title: Add support for static summary for side effects and mutable side effects
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Side Effect markers in the UI lack identifiable information when multiple appear in quick succession. Users need static summary support for side effects and mutable side effects, similar to activities and local activities, to distinguish them without clicking.

issues.title: Use normal task queue name for sticky task queue client metrics
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Port metrics enhancement from sdk-core to use normal task queue names for sticky task queue client metrics, improving metric consistency across Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: SideEffects markers are very difficult to navigate in the timeline
issues.author: djeer
issues.summary: SideEffect markers in workflow timelines are difficult to navigate when there are many in sequence, as users can only identify them by examining payloads. The request is to add naming capabilities to SideEffects for better timeline visibility, though the maintainer proposed using marker summaries instead.

issues.title: Lost messages from workflow.NewChannel(ctx)
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Messages are being lost from workflow.NewChannel(ctx) when using selectors with the unblockSelectorSignal flag enabled. This regression was introduced in version 1.35.0 and affects the channel worker pattern.

issues.title: NewTestActivityEnvironment no longer implements worker.ActivityRegistry
issues.author: kylelemons
issues.summary: NewTestActivityEnvironment no longer implements the worker.ActivityRegistry interface as of v1.35.0, breaking code that relied on this interface implementation. The root cause is adding a new method (RegisterDynamicActivity) to the public interface, which is a breaking change in Go.

issues.title: Allow heartbeats after Activity cancellation
issues.author: ntaylorkhan
issues.summary: Allow activities in the Go SDK to send heartbeats after server-initiated cancellation, similar to workflows' disconnected context behavior. Currently, activities cannot ignore cancellation requests, unlike other SDKs.

issues.title: add trace-id and span-id tags to sdk logs
issues.author: jjaegerman
issues.summary: SDK logs (e.g., activity failure logs) do not include trace-id and span-id tags when using the OpenTelemetry tracing interceptor, even when traces are sampled. User logs correctly include these tags, but SDK logs are missing them.

issues.title: ResetWorkflow panic policy
issues.author: elb3k
issues.summary: Request for a new panic policy option to reset workflows from the start when encountering panics or non-deterministic behavior, allowing automatic recovery without requiring workflow retry with its associated limitations.

issues.title: Expose Temporal Nexus operation info to Temporal Nexus operation authors
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to expose Temporal Nexus operation information to Nexus operation authors, allowing them to access context about the operations they're implementing. This is tracked as a feature enhancement in the Go SDK.

issues.title: Support `fmt.Stringer` in `ExecuteActivity`
issues.author: LukaGiorgadze
issues.summary: Request to support `fmt.Stringer` interface in `ExecuteActivity` for activity name resolution. Currently only raw strings and function pointers are supported, causing unclear error messages when custom types implementing `Stringer` are passed.

issues.title: Can the work queue be manually paused?
issues.author: wangpf09
issues.summary: User requests the ability to manually pause a work queue to control whether workers accept new tasks based on resource usage monitoring, but learns that Temporal task queues don't have a pause concept and workers can only be stopped once.

issues.title: Make Deadlock Converter Configurable
issues.author: jonmorehouse
issues.summary: User requests making the Go SDK's deadlock detector configurable to emit warnings instead of failing workflows when long-running operations don't yield for over 1 second. They want to add callback hooks for warnings and make the timeout thresholds adjustable.

issues.title: Ensure tests exist to confirm custom slot supplier slot info has proper fields
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add tests to verify that custom slot supplier implementations properly set all required slot information fields. This relates to the features repository work on slot suppliers.

issues.title: AssertActivityCalled does not capture calls or/and argument being passed
issues.author: ebrard
issues.summary: AssertActivityCalled does not verify that mocked activities were called with specific arguments unless the activity is explicitly mocked. The method captures activity execution but the assertion fails to match it, despite the activity actually being called with correct arguments.

issues.title: Test environment does not deliver signals to mocked child workflow
issues.author: Patrick-McKeever
issues.summary: Signals sent to mocked child workflows in the test environment only deliver the first signal; subsequent signals block indefinitely instead of triggering their registered handlers.

issues.title: Joining errors causes TestWorkflowEnvironment to hide panics and pass test
issues.author: ioudas
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment doesn't properly propagate errors wrapped with errors.Join or fmt.Errorf, causing tests to pass when they should fail with unregistered activity errors.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Reclassify Benign Application errors in OpenTelemetry
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Feature request to reclassify benign application errors in OpenTelemetry spans, improving error categorization and observability. This is a cross-SDK effort also being tracked in the Python SDK.

issues.title: Flaky tests: TestIntegrationSuite/TestGrpcMessageTooLarge
issues.author: maciejdudko
issues.summary: A newly added gRPC message size test (TestGrpcMessageTooLarge) is flaky in CI with unknown cause, potentially due to timing-dependent error behavior. The test needs to be rewritten to not rely on error timing.

issues.title: Add Go to Waitgroup
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add a Go method to the workflow-safe Waitgroup to match Go 1.25's sync.WaitGroup.Go() for API consistency across the SDK.

issues.title: Move RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED_CAUSE_EXT_GRPC_MESSAGE_TOO_LARGE to upstream API
issues.author: maciejdudko
issues.summary: Move the RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED_CAUSE_EXT_GRPC_MESSAGE_TOO_LARGE constant from the SDK extension to the upstream API definition. This constant was added for better handling of gRPC message too large errors and should be standardized in the official API to avoid compatibility issues.

issues.title: Workflowcheck does not compile with go1.25.0
issues.author: azdagron
issues.summary: workflowcheck tool fails to compile with Go 1.25.0 due to a breaking change in golang.org/x/tools dependency. The issue was resolved by updating the x/tools version in the master branch and releasing workflowcheck v0.4.0.

issues.title: Fix DescribeTaskQueueEnhanced w/ stats to use non-deprecated APIs
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: The DescribeTaskQueueEnhanced API call is using deprecated fields for retrieving task queue statistics. This needs to be updated to use the current non-deprecated APIs, with corresponding test uncommentations in TestTaskQueueStats.

issues.title: Set Span Kinds in Otel tracer interceptors
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Go SDK's OTel tracer interceptors should set span kinds (client for outbound, server for inbound) to match the behavior already implemented in Python, .NET, and Ruby SDKs.

issues.title: Graceful worker shutdown of sessions
issues.author: renescheepers
issues.summary: Feature request for graceful worker shutdown that waits for all open sessions to close before shutting down. Currently, workers don't wait for sessions to complete during deployment, causing heartbeat timeouts and workflow failures.

issues.title: Plugin support
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request for plugin support in the Go SDK, referenced from the features repository issue tracker. This is an enhancement request to enable extensibility through a plugin architecture.

issues.title: Add first execution run ID to workflow info
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to expose the first execution run ID in workflow info. The feature was already implemented and is available in the SDK.

issues.title: Remove usage of deprecated `Control` fields
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Remove deprecated `control` field usage from Go SDK that may be removed from server in the future. The field is currently set to event number, which should be used directly instead.

issues.title: `WorkerDeploymentVersion.BuildId` should be `...BuildID` (as everywhere else)
issues.author: Drahflow
issues.summary: WorkerDeploymentVersion struct uses BuildId instead of BuildID, violating Go naming conventions and creating inconsistency with other SDK structs that use BuildID.

issues.title: Setting a mock activity to Never isn't always enforced
issues.author: OfirEnglard
issues.summary: Mock activities set to Never() don't always panic as expected when called in workflows. Tests that should fail are passing because the panic from the mock framework isn't being properly propagated through the internal task handler's recover mechanism.

issues.title: Add a compiler check to ensure the WorkflowReplayer interface implements the WorkflowRegistry interface.
issues.author: GSmithApps
issues.summary: WorkflowReplayer interface broke compatibility with WorkflowRegistry interface after dynamic workflows were added. A compiler check is needed to ensure WorkflowReplayer implements WorkflowRegistry, requiring the addition of RegisterDynamicWorkflow method.

issues.title: OnWorkflow test mocker doesn't propagate context headers
issues.author: codemonkeycxy
issues.summary: The OnWorkflow test mocker in the Go SDK doesn't propagate context headers that are passed from parent workflows to child workflows. While the actual child workflow can access these headers, the test mocking framework cannot see them.

issues.title: Feature request: more robust deployments with shutdownGraceTime
issues.author: giovannibonetti-jota
issues.summary: Feature request for a shutdownGraceTime option in the Go SDK to allow a grace period before worker shutdown, preventing activity aborts during deployments. The user referenced the TypeScript SDK implementation and was directed to the existing WorkerStopTimeout configuration.

issues.title: Try synctest for time control
issues.author: vikstrous2
issues.summary: Exploration of whether Go 1.24/1.25's new synctest feature could simplify temporal SDK testing by providing built-in time control instead of the current manual fake clock implementation.

issues.title: DataConverter silent all encoding error
issues.author: cedricmoulard
issues.summary: DataConverter silently returns unencrypted payloads when the Encode method raises an error, instead of propagating the error to the caller. This creates a security issue where encryption failures are hidden and plaintext data is used without warning.

issues.title: workflowRunOperationToken should not encode version if 0
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The workflowRunOperationToken should skip encoding the version field when its value is 0, reducing unnecessary data in the token.

issues.title: Do we have any temporal service health status metrics -This is just for information
issues.author: amithmanden
issues.summary: User inquired about availability of service health status metrics in the Go SDK and whether service health is checked internally. The issue was immediately marked as ignore by the author.

issues.title: Add Summary to LocalActivityOptions
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Add a Summary field to LocalActivityOptions in the Go SDK to align with the features specification. This enhancement allows developers to provide a description of local activities, matching the functionality available in other SDKs.

issues.title: SDK should warn when using structures to define a workflow
issues.author: iwittkau
issues.summary: Users implementing workflows as struct methods with pointer receivers can inadvertently create non-deterministic code. The team decided to add documentation warnings rather than expand the workflowcheck tool to detect this pattern.

issues.title: StartDevServer fails with Cloudflare `Error 1101` when downloading Temporal v1.27.2
issues.author: gnarea
issues.summary: User reports that testsuite.StartDevServer fails with Cloudflare Error 1101 when attempting to download Temporal CLI v1.27.2, but the issue is resolved when they realize v1.27.2 refers to the server version, not the CLI version.

issues.title: Expose StartToCloseTimeout in ActivityInfo struct
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Request to expose StartToCloseTimeout in the Go SDK's ActivityInfo struct, similar to the Java SDK implementation. This would allow activities to access their timeout configuration at runtime.

issues.title: Feature Request: Include Version in workflowcheck -V=full Output
issues.author: deepika-awasthi
issues.summary: The workflowcheck binary doesn't embed version information and currently shows 'version devel' when queried with -V=full flag. Users want the actual version used during installation to be displayed.

issues.title: ContinueAsNew should create new root span
issues.author: bincyber
issues.summary: ContinueAsNew creates overly large traces by attaching new workflows to existing spans, potentially overwhelming tracing backends. The request is to create new disconnected root spans for ContinueAsNew and child workflows, linked to the original trace.

issues.title: [go] Add `WorkflowTaskFailedCause` to `RespondQueryTaskCompletedRequest`
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Request to add `WorkflowTaskFailedCause` field to `RespondQueryTaskCompletedRequest` API, mirroring the existing functionality available for workflow task failures.

issues.title: better error messages when Error context deadline exceeded
issues.author: spa5k
issues.summary: Users receive unhelpful generic 'context deadline exceeded' errors when activity results exceed the 2MB size limit. The request is for more specific error messages that clearly indicate the actual cause (e.g., 'context size limit exceeded') rather than generic timeout errors.

issues.title: GetWorkerStopChannel no longer indicates worker shutdown for Local Activities
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: GetWorkerStopChannel() is not properly indicating worker shutdown for local activities after a recent change. The worker stop channel should be preserved in the Local Activity poller to correctly signal worker shutdown, while ensuring the LA-specific stop channel is closed at the right time.

issues.title: Getting a strange error when writing tests which does not occur in real temporal deployment
issues.author: josvegit
issues.summary: Test suite encounters an "illegal access from outside of workflow context" error when calling activities within child workflows during testing, despite the same code working correctly in production Temporal deployments. The error suggests context is not properly propagated in the test environment when using selector.AddReceive.

issues.title: Ability to get original Logger from activity.GetLogger(ctx) / workflow.GetLogger(ctx)
issues.author: SovaPluto
issues.summary: User requests the ability to retrieve the original logger instance from activity.GetLogger(ctx) or workflow.GetLogger(ctx) instead of receiving a wrapped ReplayLogger. The issue is that injected context fields from custom loggers and trace interceptors are lost when the logger is wrapped.

issues.title: UpdateWorkflow does not use context aware data converter
issues.author: raymondregrello
issues.summary: UpdateWorkflow does not use the context-aware data converter that was provided to the client, causing payloads to be encrypted with the wrong key when a tenant-specific encryption context is set.

issues.title: Remove license headers from files in api-go
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove license headers from all files in the api-go repository following the pattern established in the temporal server repository, including both source and generated files.

issues.title: Remove license headers from files
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove license headers from all files in the SDK following the server's decision to no longer require them. This includes removing any tooling that generates or enforces license headers.

issues.title: `SearchAttributes.Copy` is getting flagged by `workflowcheck`
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: SearchAttributes.Copy method is being incorrectly flagged by workflowcheck linter and needs to be marked as ignored to prevent false positives.

issues.title: CLI supports redrive task queue and start workflow
issues.author: yinsidij
issues.summary: User requests CLI support for redriving workflows stuck in task queue and batch rerunning them using saved payloads, as the reset button is unavailable for workflows not yet dispatched to workers.

issues.title: Bug: remote dataconverter schedule decsribe
issues.author: ron20hg
issues.summary: scheduleHandle.Describe() fails with a proto decoding error when using a remote data converter, because the schedule metadata contains a null payload that the codec cannot process.

issues.title: `workflowcheck` invalidly assumes `reflect.New` is non-deterministic
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The `workflowcheck` tool incorrectly flags `reflect.New` as non-deterministic due to sync.Map operations, even though it should be deterministic like `reflect.Value.Interface`.

issues.title: client.Dial HostPort does not resolve Docker container DNS names
issues.author: aentwist
issues.summary: client.Dial fails to resolve Docker container DNS names, requiring users to manually resolve the hostname to an IP address. The issue stems from gRPC's name resolution behavior in Docker environments where the standard DNS resolver doesn't handle Docker's service discovery properly.

issues.title: Provide a type-safe implementation of workflow.ExecuteActivity
issues.author: iwittkau
issues.summary: Request for type-safe generic wrappers around workflow.ExecuteActivity to eliminate boilerplate and provide compile-time type checking for activity arguments and results.

issues.title: [go] SDK support for activity reset
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request for SDK support for activity reset functionality in the Go SDK, mirroring feature work tracked in the features repository.

issues.title: Have implicit activity context timeout start-to-close be relative to system time not server time
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activity start-to-close timeout is currently calculated from server-provided start time, making it subject to system clock skew. The request is to base it on local system time (time.Now()) instead to be more resilient to time differences.

issues.title: OTel emitted metrics do not match behavior described in the docs
issues.author: kevinawoo
issues.summary: OTel metrics in the Go SDK use UpDownCounter but the documentation and other SDK implementations describe metrics as monotonically increasing. The current implementation allows negative values which doesn't match expected counter behavior across other Temporal SDKs and OTel standards.

issues.title: Race condition with Local Activities and worker shutdown
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Race condition in local activity execution during worker shutdown causes inconsistent error messages. The activity context may complete before worker shutdown is processed, resulting in 'context canceled' instead of 'ErrWorkerShutdown'.

issues.title: Warn when the server-provided task start time is fairly different than time SDK begins processing the task
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add a warning when the server-provided task start time differs significantly from when the SDK begins processing the task. This feature was proposed to help detect timing issues between server and client.

issues.title: [api-go] Remove cloud submodule and cloud protos
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove the cloud submodule and cloud protos from api-go now that cloud-sdk-go repository exists as the dedicated home for cloud-related functionality.

issues.title: Show retry policy on activity info
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose the retry policy associated with an activity in the ActivityInfo object, allowing developers to inspect retry configuration at runtime.

issues.title: Can we have a option for local activity for not marking result to the history
issues.author: satya-nected
issues.summary: User requested an option to prevent local activity results from being logged to workflow history to handle large data (2-5MB+) that exceeds size limits. The maintainer clarified this is unsafe and recommended restructuring data to only return the subset needed.

issues.title: activity Schedule To Close timeoutActivity complete after timeout
issues.author: Pharaohsk
issues.summary: Activity fails with "Activity complete after timeout" error when Temporal cluster nodes have unsynchronized clocks and the schedule-to-close timeout is exceeded on the worker's local time. The issue occurs because the deadline is calculated based on server time, not worker local time.

issues.title: Apply application failure logging and metrics behaviour according to ApplicationErrorCategory
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Implement application failure logging and metrics behavior for the Go SDK according to ApplicationErrorCategory specifications defined in the features repository. This involves standardizing how application errors are logged and metrically tracked across different error categories.

issues.title: workflowcheck crash (index out of range)
issues.author: Bysmyyr
issues.summary: The workflowcheck tool crashes with an 'index out of range' panic when analyzing packages without source files (like the 'unsafe' package). The crash occurs in the analysis framework when it tries to access Files[0] without checking if the Files slice is empty.

issues.title: Heartbeating activities should be interrupted when the activities are paused.
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Activities that are paused should have their heartbeats interrupted rather than continuing to send heartbeat signals. This is a behavior correction to ensure paused activities don't maintain background activity.

issues.title: Support simulating race conditions during signal draining
issues.author: joshmsmith
issues.summary: Request to support simulating race conditions during signal draining in Go SDK tests to improve test coverage. The challenge is that signal draining occurs in a narrow time window that's difficult to trigger reliably in tests.

issues.title: Context is mutated between interceptors and activity
issues.author: stan-stately
issues.summary: Context is mutated between interceptors and activity by stripping headers using context.WithValue(), preventing users from passing custom context types through interceptors to activities.

issues.title: [api-go] Support proxy interceptor returning valid response and error
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Proxy interceptors should be able to return both a valid response and an error simultaneously. Currently, when an error occurs, the system immediately returns the error without processing the payload/failure information.

issues.title: enabling FIPS only mode with go 1.24.1 raises panic related to MD5 usage
issues.author: muralisrini
issues.summary: Go SDK v1.33.0 panics with MD5 crypto error when FIPS 140-only mode is enabled in Go 1.24.1. The panic occurs during worker initialization when computing binary checksums, and setting BuildID workaround fails with timeouts in strict FIPS mode.

issues.title: [api-go] failure converter/payload codec interceptor order issue
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Failure converter payloads may bypass the payload visitor interceptor if the failure converter is positioned before the payload visitor in the interceptor chain. Documentation should clarify the required ordering of failure converter and payload codec interceptors.

issues.title: Serialization context for codecs and converters
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add serialization context support for codecs and converters. This issue was identified as a duplicate of an existing feature request.

issues.title: Caller skips is incorrectly calculated when a custom logger is provided to the SDK client
issues.author: AhmadElsagheer
issues.summary: When a custom logger implementing both `log.Logger` and `log.WithSkipCallers` interfaces is provided to the SDK client, the caller skip count is incorrectly calculated, resulting in the wrong file and line number being reported in logs.

issues.title: Many internal `GetSystemInfo` requests use `defaultGetSystemInfoTimeout` even if `ConnectionOptions.GetSystemInfoTimeout` was passed
issues.author: stan-stately
issues.summary: Internal GetSystemInfo calls in multiple locations ignore the ConnectionOptions.GetSystemInfoTimeout value and use the default timeout instead. This causes timeouts even when users configure a custom timeout for system info requests.

issues.title: Document that local activities should not use anonymous functions
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Documentation needed for local activities to advise against using anonymous functions, as they can result in non-deterministic activity types and pose risks from capturing local variables.

issues.title: SetOnChildWorkflowCompletedListener doesn't work as expected
issues.author: nicovak
issues.summary: SetOnChildWorkflowCompletedListener is not being invoked when child workflows complete with errors in testing scenarios. The listener should catch async child workflow errors but currently fails to trigger.

issues.title: ResourceBasedSlotSupplier.ReleaseSlot not implemented
issues.author: captchanjack-anzx
issues.summary: Activity slots created with ResourceBasedSlotSupplier are not being released after task completion, causing activities to remain stuck in PENDING_ACTIVITY_STATE_SCHEDULED state. The ReleaseSlot method is not implemented in the SlotSupplier interface.

issues.title: [api-go] Repeated Payload not being visited
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: The VisitPayloads function was not visiting repeated Payload fields nested within protobuf messages, causing visitor callbacks to be skipped for these payloads. This prevented proper traversal and mutation of payloads in structures like CountWorkflowExecutionsResponse_AggregationGroup.

issues.title: [api-go] Support repeated Any fields
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: The SDK's Payload visitor doesn't properly handle repeated Any fields in protobuf messages. Currently it visits individual Any fields but fails to parse and visit through arrays/maps of Any values, such as the repeated Any field in MultiOperationExecutionFailure_OperationStatus in the Temporal API.

issues.title: [api-go] Support direct Payload's and Payload`s at top-level of Any in payload visitor
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: The payload visitor in the Go SDK cannot visit Payload objects that are directly marshaled into an Any type at the top level. This feature request asks for adding a missing case to handle this scenario for future API support.

issues.title: Add summary to Nexus operation
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Request to add a summary field to Nexus operations, tracking the related feature request in the main features repository.

issues.title: testsuite.TestUpdateCallback method should be given no-ops when not provided
issues.author: mnichols
issues.summary: TestUpdateCallback in the testsuite doesn't provide no-op implementations for optional callbacks, causing nil pointer panics when callbacks aren't supplied. Users need to implement all callbacks even if they only care about some of them, making tests brittle and error messages unhelpful.

issues.title: WorkflowIdReusePolicy document should mention WorkflowExecutionErrorWhenAlreadyStarted option
issues.author: yux0
issues.summary: Documentation for WorkflowIdReusePolicy is misleading because it doesn't mention that WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedFailure is only returned when the WorkflowExecutionErrorWhenAlreadyStarted option is explicitly set, not by default.

issues.title: ExecuteWorkflow API document with return errors
issues.author: yux0
issues.summary: The ExecuteWorkflow API documentation is missing information about the WorkflowExecutionErrorWhenAlreadyStarted error that can be returned when the corresponding option is set.

issues.title: Expose root workflow execution
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to expose root workflow execution context in the Go SDK. References feature request #605 in the features repository, noting that only the workflow info part may need implementation due to how list and describe operations work in the SDK.

issues.title: AsTime() on a nil pointer converts to  Jan. 1st, 1970 at midnight UTC
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: A nil pointer timestamp in protobuf maps to Jan 1st, 1970 UTC with IsZero() returning false, causing CLI filters (cardOmitEmpty, omitEmpty) to not properly exclude uninitialized timestamps. This affects both CLI and raw gRPC API users.

issues.title: Built-in query responses should use "RawValue"
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Built-in query responses should return raw values instead of encoded values to match the behavior defined in the Temporal features specification.

issues.title: Support "RawValue" non-converted values
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request for a simple payload wrapper to prevent converters from applying conversion to values, similar to existing functionality in another issue.

issues.title: Activities with the same name from different struct methods are treated and handled as the same.
issues.author: adetunjii
issues.summary: Activities with identical names from different struct methods are treated as the same activity, causing the wrong activity to be executed. The issue occurs when registering multiple activities with the same method name (e.g., PerformActivity from different packages), and the system executes the first registered activity instead of the correct one.

issues.title: Remove old Nexus workflow run operation token format
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove support for the old Nexus workflow run operation token format and treat unparsable tokens as handler errors, aligning with the Java SDK implementation.

issues.title: Non-deterministic workflow code can send incorrect WFT completion without task failure
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: Non-deterministic workflow code causes the SDK to incorrectly re-send acceptance and completion messages for a previously handled update on subsequent workflow task executions, resulting in invalid state transitions in the History service.

issues.title: SDK client connection Issue on localhost
issues.author: spy16
issues.summary: SDK client connection times out when using 'localhost:7233' but works with '127.0.0.1:7233'. This is a known issue with gRPC Go's DNS resolver behavior on localhost.

issues.title: doclink: Incorrect "Exposed" requirement in method without context
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: The doclink tool incorrectly adds an 'Exposed' requirement to the GetHandle method even though the method itself does not require this documentation directive. The -fix flag was adding unnecessary and incorrect documentation.

issues.title: TestNumPollersCounter consistently fails on stable macos-arm in CI
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: TestNumPollersCounter metric test fails on stable macOS ARM CI, showing 1 poller instead of expected 2. Failure is specific to CI environment and cannot be reproduced locally.

issues.title: [api-go] Proxy gRPC interceptors in should visit payloads and failures of gRPC errors too
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The gRPC interceptors in api-go should visit payloads and failures not only in the main payload, but also within the status details of gRPC errors, to ensure comprehensive payload and failure transformation across error responses.

issues.title: Expose Workflow cancel cause/reason
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Expose workflow cancellation cause/reason to users. The WorkflowExecutionCancelRequestedEventAttributes already contains a cause field that should be exposed when workflows receive cancels, and this information should also be available as input when users issue cancels from clients or commands.

issues.title: Environment configuration
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Implement environment-based configuration for the Go SDK to support external client configuration, aligning with cross-SDK standards defined in proposals and features discussions.

issues.title: Doc tool flags missing annotations on variable declarations
issues.author: stephanos
issues.summary: The doc tool build command fails when function variable declarations have doc comments without 'Exposed as:' annotations. It should ignore variable declarations inside functions instead of requiring the annotation.

issues.title: [api-go] Code gen for payload visiting should walk all descriptors instead of workflow service reachability
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Code generator for payload visiting should walk all proto file descriptors instead of relying on workflow service reachability to ensure all proto messages are caught, including orphaned ones.

issues.title: Change application error to Nexus HandlerError conversion to use non-retryable internal errors
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Change how application errors are converted to Nexus HandlerError to use non-retryable internal errors instead of the current approach. This is a breaking change required before the Go SDK reaches GA and depends on server version 1.27.0.

issues.title: [api-go] Add test for proxy to make sure all payloads are visited even if it's not reachable
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Add a test to verify that the payload proxy visits all payloads even when they are not reachable by the workflow service. The test should confirm payload encoding across existing integration tests rather than creating a contrived test case.

issues.title: Configure extra log fields for SDK workflow and activity logs
issues.author: timofurrer
issues.summary: User requests the ability to configure extra log fields for SDK workflow and activity logs at runtime, since business-related values are only known during workflow/activity creation, not at worker initialization.

issues.title: Current "latest" sdk-go incompatible with just-released api-go v1.44.0
issues.author: dotwaffle
issues.summary: User reported that sdk-go v1.32.1 is incompatible with api-go v1.44.0 due to removed symbols. The issue was clarified to be related to using Temporal Server as a library rather than an SDK compatibility problem, with the actual conflict occurring in server's OIDC codec-server implementation.

issues.title: Add `Patched()` and `DeprecatePatch()` APIs
issues.author: mjameswh
issues.summary: Add `Patched()` and `DeprecatePatch()` APIs to the Go SDK for better workflow versioning support, with potential deprecation of the `GetVersion` API.

issues.title: Allow customization of dev server UI port
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to allow customization of the dev server UI port in the Go SDK. This is a feature enhancement to provide developers with more flexibility when configuring the Temporal development server.

issues.title: Special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Implement special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes in the Go SDK to align with features defined in the cross-repository specification.

issues.title: Rename Worker Deployment API interfaces
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Worker Deployment API interfaces are being renamed and refactored to reflect the embedding of the Rollout API within a Deployment resource.

issues.title: Add ramp to Worker Deployments
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Add support for the ramp API to Worker Deployments, enabling graceful transitions of Workflows and Activity tasks between two implementations.

issues.title: Provide flag to tell the update handler that the handling is from a re-apply
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: Request to add a flag in the update handler to indicate when handling is from a re-apply operation, addressing feature request from temporalio/features#564.

issues.title: Doclink bug: duplicate "Exposed as" strings being generated
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: The doclink tool is generating duplicate "Exposed as" docstrings when processing aliases. Running the tool with the -fix flag causes these duplicates to appear instead of a single docstring.

issues.title: Versioning override AutoUpgrade using a ref to an empty deployment struct instead of a nil pointer
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: The versioning override API in UpdateWorkflowExecutionOptions incorrectly provides a pointer to an empty Deployment struct instead of a nil pointer to set AutoUpgrade behavior, causing the server to fail the request.

issues.title: Provide client from activity context
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to provide access to a Temporal client from within activity execution context. This would enable activities to interact with the Temporal system by exposing a function like GetClient(context.Context) or GetClientInActivity(context.Context).

issues.title: Provide "workflow local"
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Users need a type-safe, workflow-scoped local variable mechanism to store values that persist only within a specific workflow execution. The proposal suggests a `workflow.LocalVar[T]` API with Get/Set methods that provide sugar over context values.

issues.title: Change activity error to warn, or allow it to be configurable
issues.author: longquanzheng
issues.summary: User requests the ability to configure activity error logging level from ERROR to WARN, since many activity errors are retryable and not critical. A comment notes that ApplicationErrorCategoryBenign can already downgrade to DEBUG level.

issues.title: `WithStartOperation` docs fix
issues.author: stephanos
issues.summary: Documentation for StartWorkflowOptions on pkg.go.dev still references the deprecated WithStartOperation from the old Update-with-Start API. The docs should be updated to remove this outdated reference and clarify that WorkflowIDConflictPolicy is required.

issues.title: Malformed code links in API docs
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: API documentation links are malformed in the Go SDK docs, preventing proper link rendering on pkg.go.dev. The documentation should follow Go's documentation link syntax guidelines to create valid references between API elements.

issues.title: unsuccessfulOperationErr.Failure undefined
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: SDK v1.30.1 fails to compile due to missing Failure field on HandlerError and UnsuccessfulOperationError types from the nexus-rpc/sdk-go dependency. The issue was caused by breaking changes in the nexus dependency that weren't properly handled in the SDK.

issues.title: Can we get a release of workflowcheck?
issues.author: azdagron
issues.summary: User requests an official release of the workflowcheck tool, which hasn't been tagged for 9 months. A recent commit fixes handling of Go 1.22 alias types that should be included in the next release.

issues.title: Fail registration of workflow types without versioning behavior
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Worker Versioning-3 requires workflows to specify versioning behavior (either via default or per-workflow option), but the SDK doesn't validate this at registration time. This proposal adds registration-time validation to fail early when versioning behavior is missing, and removes the programmatic API for setting versioning behavior.

issues.title: `WorkflowTestSuite.UpdateWorkflow` should generate an update ID if none is set like the `WorkflowClient`
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: WorkflowTestSuite.UpdateWorkflow should auto-generate an update ID when none is provided, matching the behavior of WorkflowClient. Currently it treats missing update IDs as empty strings, creating a discrepancy.

issues.title: Session worker delays with single activity limit after Tuner introduction
issues.author: sevein
issues.summary: Session workers experience significant delays (~120 seconds) before executing activities when MaxConcurrentActivityExecutionSize is set to 1, introduced after the worker tuner changes in SDK v1.29.0. Every other activity in a session is delayed despite completing quickly.

issues.title: Simplify the update-wth-start API
issues.author: shizambles
issues.summary: The update-with-start API required confusing double calls to ExecuteWorkflow with different options. A simplified single API function was requested and subsequently implemented in v1.31.0.

issues.title: Add accessors for ChildWorkflowExecutionError fields
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: ChildWorkflowExecutionError has private fields that users cannot access. The request is to add public accessor methods to expose these fields.

issues.title: Make it possible to keep workflows in worker cache also if they're only queried
issues.author: recht
issues.summary: Worker cache discards workflows after query processing, requiring expensive replays on subsequent queries. Request to add a config option to keep queried workflows in the sticky cache for better performance.

issues.title: Add VersioningOverride to StartWorkflowExecutionRequest
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Add VersioningOverride to StartWorkflowExecutionRequest to allow specifying target versioning information when creating a workflow, overriding the current default. This is needed for canary tests in the versioning-3 branch.

issues.title: Add versioning fields to WorkflowExecutionInfo
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Versioning-3 experimental API introduces new versioning_info metadata that needs to be exposed in WorkflowExecutionInfo. The Go SDK exposes raw protobufs for WorkflowExecutionInfo, and this feature would make the new versioning metadata accessible to users and the CLI.

issues.title: Support the Deployment API
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Add support for the Deployment API, a low-level CRUD interface for managing worker deployments and enabling Worker versioning-3. This API allows direct control over deployment targets and workflow routing across worker pools.

issues.title: Add support for the UpdateWorkflowExecutionOptions API
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Add support for the UpdateWorkflowExecutionOptions API in SDK-go to enable external tools to override versioning attributes for existing workflows. This is a prerequisite for CLI support.

issues.title: ProcessWorkflowTask is not stopped on worker.Stop()
issues.author: ndtretyak
issues.summary: When a worker is stopped during workflow task execution, the ProcessWorkflowTask continues sending heartbeats and blocks further workflow execution instead of being stopped. This causes workflows with local activities to hang when the worker is restarted.

issues.title: User-defined RequestId for SignalWorkflow
issues.author: ndtretyak
issues.summary: User requests ability to specify custom RequestId for SignalWorkflow to enable server-side deduplication. Currently RequestId is always generated as UUID, but server-side deduplication by RequestId is not a stable feature.

issues.title: fatal error: concurrent map writes when u
issues.author: delanne
issues.summary: Concurrent map writes cause fatal error when multiple tests with t.Parallel() share a single TestActivityEnvironment. The activities map is not thread-safe and needs synchronization protection.

issues.title: go.temporal.io/sdk/contrib/datadog to provide way to access DataDog spans from within a workflow
issues.author: cdimitroulas
issues.summary: Request to provide a way to access DataDog spans from within a workflow context to enable custom tagging and span manipulation. The solution involves adding a `SpanFromWorkflowContext` function to the datadog contrib package, similar to the `tracer.SpanFromContext` API.

issues.title: Test environment shouldn't default to SdkFlags being true
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: The test environment dispatcher automatically sets SDK flags to true by default, but they should be off by default. This causes test behavior to differ from production defaults.

issues.title: Enable type-scoped Versioning Behavior for workflows
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Add a DefaultVersioningBehavior option to workflow.RegisterOptions to provide a default versioning behavior for workflow types, reducing the need for programmatic SetVersioningBehavior() calls during workflow task execution.

issues.title: Provide details and actionable info about Non Deterministic Errors
issues.author: longquanzheng
issues.summary: Non-Deterministic Error (NDE) messages lack actionable details about what changed in workflow code. Users need clearer error messages that explicitly state what workflow operation was expected versus what was actually encountered during replay.

issues.title: Auto propagate context value to activity
issues.author: afifurrohman-id
issues.summary: User requests automatic propagation of Go context.Context values to activities without requiring manual configuration. Currently, context propagation requires manually defining each key and ensuring values are serializable, but the user has dynamic keys based on requests that need to be propagated automatically.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment has non-standard RunID "default-test-run-id"
issues.author: askreet
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment uses a non-UUID string "default-test-run-id" for RunID instead of a valid UUID format, which breaks applications that validate RunID as UUID. Discussion clarified that run ID format is not guaranteed by Temporal and applications shouldn't assume UUID format.

issues.title: undefined: nexus.HandlerErrorTypeDownstreamTimeout error
issues.author: Flo4604
issues.summary: A compilation error occurred in Go SDK v1.29.1 due to undefined nexus.HandlerErrorTypeDownstreamTimeout, which was resolved in v1.30.0. The issue stemmed from a version mismatch between the Go SDK and Go API packages.

issues.title: Update Godoc for `internal` structs/funcs to clarify the package they are exposed under
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update Godoc documentation for internal structs and functions to clarify which public package they are exposed under. Discussion evolved to suggest documenting all exported internal types with their public aliases, potentially via automated tooling with CI validation.

issues.title: Support user metadata on activities and child/scheduled workflows
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Expose user metadata fields (summary, static summary, static details) on activities and child/scheduled workflows that were previously added internally but marked with TODO statements.

issues.title: AssertNumberOfCalls on an Activity succeeds even if the Activity is not called the asserted number of times.
issues.author: ClairePhi
issues.summary: AssertNumberOfCalls incorrectly succeeds when checking if an activity was called a specific number of times, even when the activity was not actually called that many times. The method checks if either workflows OR activities were called N times, rather than checking the specific callable being tested.

issues.title: Erroneous extra replay command when replaying mid-workflow tasks
issues.author: RamyElkest
issues.summary: Replaying a downloaded workflow history that ends with a workflow task in 'started' state incorrectly fails with a nondeterministic workflow error. The issue occurs because history matching for non-determinism checks continues after the last task start without an end event.

issues.title: When deserializing typed search attributes, invalid values should be ignored
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: When deserializing typed search attributes, the SDK panics on invalid values instead of ignoring them. This particularly affects workflows created with untyped attributes (like single-item arrays) when accessing typed search attributes or when using CLI commands like schedule describe.

issues.title: Add high-level workflow describe
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add a high-level DescribeWorkflow call on the Go SDK client that returns workflow execution information in a structured WorkflowExecutionDescription, deprecating the existing DescribeWorkflowExecution method. The implementation should be interceptable and follow the design patterns established in TypeScript, Python, and .NET SDKs.

issues.title: Add workflow annotations for versioning
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Add support for workflow annotations to enable the new versioning APIs in the Go SDK. This feature is part of a larger initiative to support advanced versioning patterns.

issues.title: Running activities in separate processes
issues.author: giuliohome
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for running activities in separate processes in Go SDK, similar to Python's ProcessPoolExecutor. The issue asks for an equivalent pattern to achieve process isolation for activities and environment variable isolation.

issues.title: List of flaky tests
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Tracking flaky tests in the Go SDK test suite. Multiple tests are failing intermittently, including TestSideEffectDefer, TestIntegrationSuite variants, and TestMockCallWrapperNotBefore, with some failures appearing as of Go 1.24.

issues.title: Show update handler and ID in logging context
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to enhance logging context in the Go SDK to display update handler information and ID alongside other context data.

issues.title: SetStartTime for activity test env
issues.author: rrrkren
issues.summary: TestActivityEnvironment lacks a SetStartTime method that exists in TestWorkflowEnvironment, preventing proper testing of start time related features in activities. This is a feature parity request to enable consistent testing patterns across workflow and activity test environments.

issues.title: Ignore search attributes from GetVersion in mocks
issues.author: ndtretyak
issues.summary: GetVersion internally calls UpsertSearchAttributes with non-deterministic changeID values, causing test mocks to fail when developers try to assert UpsertSearchAttributes behavior. The issue was resolved by clarifying documentation and suggesting developers use MatchedBy for flexible assertions.

issues.title: Improve UX for testing Workflow Update with the Workflow Test Environment
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Improve UX for testing Workflow Updates by providing SDK helpers for common test scenarios, reducing the need for users to manually implement UpdateCallbacks in the Workflow Test Environment.

issues.title: Workflow Update in Test Environment should dedup updates by ID
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The test environment for workflow updates does not deduplicate updates by ID, whereas the real server deduplicates update requests with the same UpdateID. This inconsistency means tests may not properly validate deduplication behavior.

issues.title: ExecuteMultiOperation is not retrying non-admitted Updates
issues.author: stephanos
issues.summary: ExecuteMultiOperation (Update-with-Start) is not retrying when an Update fails to reach a durable stage, unlike the expected behavior where the entire call should be retried.

issues.title: Modify test suite to dump junit XML
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: Proposal to modify the Go SDK test suite to output JUnit XML files, enabling better analysis of test flakiness patterns, timings, and performance across matrix builds and multiple runs.

issues.title: API `MockWorkflowServiceServer` does not implement `WorkflowServiceServer` properly
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: MockWorkflowServiceServer generated mock does not properly implement WorkflowServiceServer interface because it fails to embed UnimplementedWorkflowServiceServer, which became required after gRPC changes. This causes compile errors when attempting to use the mock.

issues.title: workflowcheck built on 1.23 does not find any findings
issues.author: aaomidi
issues.summary: workflowcheck analyzer built with Go 1.23 fails to detect non-deterministic code issues that were properly detected in Go 1.22.7. The tool stops working after updating the go.mod file to Go 1.23.0, no longer finding issues like time.Now() calls in workflows.

issues.title: Signal sent to Selector can be lost if Default path blocks
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Signals sent to a Selector can be lost if the Default path is blocking. When AddDefault executes a long-running operation, signals sent during that execution are dropped because the readyFunc is never called. The issue requires storing signal values in the channel's recValue to prevent loss.

issues.title: API Go's payload visitor not visiting `Any` for payloads inside
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The API Go payload visitor does not visit `Any` fields that may contain payloads, causing some payloads to be missed during traversal. For example, payloads inside `Any` fields within `protobuf.Message` types are not visited.

issues.title: For `go.temporal.io/api/proxy.VisitPayloadsOptions.Visitor`, parent not properly reset (and clarify docs)
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The VisitPayloadsOptions.Visitor context parent field is not properly reset after visit calls, causing it to leak to subsequent calls. Documentation should be clarified to explicitly state the context is mutated between calls and should not be referenced beyond the current call.

issues.title: Request to make queryRejectedError public to enhance Interceptor error handling
issues.author: deepika-awasthi
issues.summary: Request to make the queryRejectedError public in the Go SDK to enable proper error handling of query rejection in interceptors when using QueryWorkflowWithOptions with QUERY_REJECT_CONDITION_NOT_OPEN.

issues.title: GetSystemInfo - panic
issues.author: longshanxu
issues.summary: Panic occurs when calling GetSystemInfo with a context that has a timeout set on Windows. The issue was resolved by adjusting timeout settings - timeouts must be greater than 10 seconds or using the IP address 127.0.0.1 instead of localhost.

issues.title: Provide access to the workflow results from worker.WorkflowReplayer
issues.author: kylelemons
issues.summary: The worker.WorkflowReplayer interface does not expose the GetWorkflowResult method that exists on the underlying concrete type, requiring users to perform manual type assertions. The issue requests adding this method to the public interface to enable testing workflows and verifying results remain consistent across replays.

issues.title: Support ContextAware for failure converters
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to add ContextAware interface support for failure converters so they can access workflow/activity context information like headers. This would enable better logging and error handling in custom failure converters.

issues.title: Update internal timers to use NewTimerWithOptions and a summary
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update internal SDK timers to use NewTimerWithOptions and provide summary information for better observability. Also expose summary parameter on AwaitWithTimeout for both internal and external use.

issues.title: Typed nil versioning ramp panics
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Setting a typed nil value for the optional Ramp field in VersioningAssignmentRule causes a panic with bad memory reference, while untyped nil works correctly.

issues.title: Treat a 100 percent ramp in a versioning assignment rule as unramped
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Feature request to treat 100% ramp in versioning assignment rules as unramped to reduce customer confusion. This depends on server-side changes and has been closed due to deprecation of assignment rules.

issues.title: Workflow replay error: lookup failed for scheduledEventID to activityID
issues.author: albertteoh
issues.summary: Workflow replay tests fail with a scheduledEventID to activityID lookup error when replaying recent workflow histories from Temporal Cloud, while older histories from earlier 2024 work correctly.

issues.title: Consider potential range-over-func APIs
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Exploration of implementing range-over-func iterator APIs in the Go SDK to take advantage of Go 1.23's new language feature for workflows, clients, and history events.

issues.title: Fix workflow start delay docs to say signal does not interrupt delay
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Documentation needs to be updated to clarify that signals do not interrupt workflow delays. This is a documentation fix to align with API behavior discussed in temporalio/api#441.

issues.title: Support updates in tracing interceptor
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for workflow updates in the tracing interceptor by implementing `ClientOutboundInterceptor.UpdateWorkflow` to populate headers and `WorkflowInboundInterceptor.ExecuteUpdate` to put span on context.

issues.title: Activity failure is not encrypted with the key set to the context propagator, used to encrypt workflow and activity payload
issues.author: antmendoza
issues.summary: Activity failure attributes are not encrypted with the context propagator's encryption key, even though workflow and activity payloads are properly encrypted. The failure converter uses a different or missing encryption key compared to the context propagator.

issues.title: Allow passing explicit search attributes when continuing as new
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: The Go SDK currently carries over the current workflow's search attributes when continuing as new, but should allow explicit specification like other SDKs do. This is a feature parity request.

issues.title: Updated context functions to match context library
issues.author: nishkrishnan
issues.summary: Request to add `workflow.WithCancelCause(..)` function to the Go SDK to match the updated `context.WithCancelCause(...)` function in the standard library. This would provide consistency between the Go SDK's context API and Go's native context package.

issues.title: Do not warn on unfinished handlers if the workflow has failed
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: The workflow handler warning system should be disabled when the workflow has already failed, to avoid spurious warnings about unfinished handlers on failed workflows.

issues.title: Workflow-init support docs
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Documentation needed for workflow initialization method that guarantees execution before signals and updates are processed. The issue requests a method to initialize workflow state before handlers receive signals/updates.

issues.title: Batched heartbeat got canceled due to caller context cancellation
issues.author: codemonkeycxy
issues.summary: RecordHeartbeat fails when called with a canceled context from an errgroup that has already finished. Users experience activity timeouts when using goroutine patterns that create derived contexts that are canceled before subsequent heartbeat calls.

issues.title: gRPC code "Unavailable" is being reported as "Unknown" by temporal SDK Client
issues.author: uritig
issues.summary: gRPC status code 'Unavailable' (HTTP 503) is being incorrectly reported as 'Unknown' by the Go SDK client, even though other gRPC clients (Python SDK, raw gRPC, Postman) correctly report the 'Unavailable' code.

issues.title: Suppor Temporal Cloud API Keys in Go SDK client
issues.author: tomahawk28
issues.summary: User requested support for Temporal Cloud API Keys in the Go SDK client. The SDK was only documented as supporting mTLS connections, though API key support was already implemented via NewAPIKeyStaticCredentials but not well-documented. The issue was resolved by clarifying that API keys are still experimental for cloud and most namespaces require mTLS authentication.

issues.title: Worker can panic if it receives a legacy query task with no history and the SDK has a destroyed execution in cache
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Worker panics with index out of range error when receiving a legacy query task with no history while a destroyed execution exists in cache. The SDK should detect this is a legacy query task and reset the cached execution, but instead crashes.

issues.title: `go.temporal.io/api/proxy.VisitPayloads` doesn't visit `export` package
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The VisitPayloads function in go.temporal.io/api/proxy doesn't support the export package, which is an orphan package not referenced by the workflow service. The request is to extend the generated code to handle this package.

issues.title: User metadata and workflow metadata query
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to implement user metadata and workflow metadata query functionality in the Go SDK. This feature is dependent on server capabilities and references a cross-repository feature request.

issues.title: Test Nexus with Cloud
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add test coverage for Nexus sync and async operations on Temporal Cloud. The challenge involves managing concurrent tests with Nexus endpoints that require advance definition and have registration delays.

issues.title: Support Search Attributes in Schedules via Query Update
issues.author: justinp-tt
issues.summary: Request to add support for Search Attributes in Schedules through Query Update functionality in the Go SDK. The issue was flagged as potentially better suited for cross-SDK tracking in the features repository rather than being Go-specific.

issues.title: Unknown NonDeterministicError
issues.author: vl4deee11
issues.summary: NonDeterministicError occurs intermittently in a workflow with a 48-hour timer and workflow updates, even though replay succeeds without errors. The issue appears related to the activity scheduling state machine in the SDK.

issues.title: Typed search attributes issue with SignalWithStartWorkflow
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Typed search attributes defined in workflow options are not propagated when using SignalWithStartWorkflow to create a new execution, though they work correctly with ExecuteWorkflow.

issues.title: After upgrading to 1.27.0 we get a context deadline exceeded
issues.author: donchev7
issues.summary: After upgrading to SDK v1.27.0, users encounter context deadline exceeded errors when connecting to Temporal Server. The issue is resolved by downgrading to v1.26.1, suggesting a regression in the newer version.

issues.title: Customize buckets per metric
issues.author: Shubhamurkade
issues.summary: User requests the ability to customize histogram buckets on a per-metric basis in the Go SDK. Currently, bucket configuration only applies globally through Tally's Reporter.RegisterTimer, making it impossible to customize buckets for specific metrics like temporal_activity_execution_latency_bucket without affecting all metrics.

issues.title: Testing - child workflow update handler not registered in test
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Child workflow update handler was not being registered in test scenarios, causing test failures. The issue was identified and fixed via PR #1548.

issues.title: Review and add tests for Nexus operation log and metrics labels
issues.author: pdoerner
issues.summary: Review and add tests for Nexus operation log and metrics labels. The issue requests auditing the labels currently set on metrics handler and logger from temporalnexus.GetMetricsHandler and temporalnexus.GetLogger (currently including Nexus service, Nexus operation, and task queue), identifying any missing useful labels, and updating tests accordingly.

issues.title: Support "query" when listing schedules
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for query filtering when listing schedules in the Go SDK, matching the existing functionality available for listing workflows.

issues.title: Unable to connect to cluster after updating to 1.27.0
issues.author: theverything
issues.summary: After upgrading to SDK v1.27.0, users encounter connection failures with 'context deadline exceeded' error. The issue was caused by a breaking change in gRPC client initialization that requires the `passthrough:///` prefix in the HostPort configuration.

issues.title: TERMINATE_IF_RUNNING doesn't work for duplicate child workflows
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: IdReusePolicy.TERMINATE_IF_RUNNING is not working correctly for duplicate child workflow starts. When a child workflow is started twice with this policy, the second start fails with ChildWorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError instead of terminating the first execution.

issues.title: Temporal Opentelemetry interceptor to use (and export) new temporal header Carrier interface
issues.author: mcbadger88
issues.summary: Request to export a Carrier implementation for OpenTelemetry trace context propagation in Temporal headers, allowing custom interceptors to use the same carrier that the temporal interceptor uses for consistent trace propagation.

issues.title: Stop checking that context is cancelled when a `CanceledError` is received
issues.author: dmateusp
issues.summary: User requests the ability to return a CanceledError from an activity without it being treated as an unexpected error. Currently, the SDK wraps user-returned CanceledErrors in a generic error, causing them to be retried rather than marked as cancelled.

issues.title: Starting DevServer with UI Enabled May Fail Due to Invalid Port Number
issues.author: tomwheeler
issues.summary: Starting a DevServer with UI enabled can fail when the calculated UI port exceeds the valid port range (1-65535). The SDK adds 1000 to the server port for the UI port, which causes an error when the server port is above 64535.

issues.title: Go SDK 1.26.0+ cannot deserialize `go.temporal.io/api` proto messages originally serialized as `gogoproto` messages
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Go SDK 1.26.0+ cannot deserialize proto messages that were originally serialized with gogoproto, breaking deserialization when API protos are upgraded from gogoproto.message to proto.Message types.

issues.title: Accept search attributes in dev server startup
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Allow users to set search attributes when starting the dev server through SDK options, which will translate to --search-attribute CLI calls.

issues.title: Workflow-friendly concurrency control
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Need a workflow-friendly concurrency control mechanism (mutex/semaphore) that is reentrant and deterministic for use within signal handlers, update handlers, and main workflow coroutines.

issues.title: Workflow-friendly concurrency control
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request for a workflow-friendly concurrency control mechanism (mutex/semaphore) that is reentrant and deterministic for use within signal handlers, update handlers, and main workflow coroutines in the Go SDK.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Minimal issue with only the word 'testing' in the body. Likely a placeholder or accidental submission that was closed.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Placeholder testing issue with minimal content.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Minimal issue with only the word 'testing' in the body. Appears to be a placeholder or incomplete submission with no clear problem statement or feature request.

issues.title: Expose UpdateID in an update handler
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: User requested exposing UpdateID in update handlers to enable unique primary keys for samples. The issue was closed as the UpdateID is already exposed through the UpdateInfo API.

issues.title: Provide methods to wait for handlers to finish
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Users need methods to wait for all remaining handlers to complete when continuing as new or exiting a workflow, allowing them to specify whether to await or ignore these handlers.

issues.title: Warn or error when update handlers dangle across CAN or workflow exit
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
