issues.summary: Session fails when a worker restarts, but for many use cases with cached shared state, the session should survive worker restarts and only fail if the worker is down long-term indicating host failure. Request is for support of durable worker IDs and automatic session re-establishment timeouts.

issues.title: Testing: Be Able to Unit Test a Workflow with a Populated `ContinuedExecutionRunID`
issues.author: Albert-Coding
issues.summary: Users cannot unit test workflows with a populated ContinuedExecutionRunID field, which prevents testing all workflow paths. A request to expose or set this value during test execution.

issues.title: No problem indicators on failed workflow input deserialization during queries
issues.author: Drahflow
issues.summary: When a workflow query fails due to deserialization errors in the workflow input payload, there are no log messages or error indicators to help diagnose the problem. Users see missing query results in the UI without understanding why.

issues.title: Support failure encoding in proxy gRPC interceptor
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for failure encoding in proxy gRPC interceptor by moving message and stack trace into encoded attributes, allowing proxies to transparently support encoded failure attributes through the interceptor.

issues.title: Allow custom time source
issues.author: mnussbaum
issues.summary: Request for a custom time source in workflows to enable testing time-dependent behavior. User needs to simulate workflow execution over dynamically sized time spans using a fake clock that controls workflow.Now() and workflow.Sleep().

issues.title: Delay in starting a scheduled workflow
issues.author: muralisrini
issues.summary: Scheduled workflows experience significant delays (up to a minute) before starting execution in the Go SDK. Multiple workflows in a loop show some waiting in scheduled state longer than expected before transitioning to running state.

issues.title: built-in query for waiting signals to go-sdk
issues.author: zengzilu
issues.summary: User requests a built-in query to inspect which signals are waiting to be processed by a workflow, distinguishing between pending signals and already-processed ones for debugging and monitoring purposes.

issues.title: Unable to reproduce `workflow.ErrSessionFailed`, session gets recreated with same ID after process restarts
issues.author: subhan-nadeem
issues.summary: After a worker process restarts, session is recreated with the same ID instead of returning ErrSessionFailed, preventing proper error handling for session failures. Additionally, in some cases activities hang indefinitely in Scheduled state when the session worker dies.

issues.title: Godoc for workflow.Sleep and workflow.NewTimer is wrong about second resolution
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The Godoc documentation for workflow.Sleep and workflow.NewTimer incorrectly states their second resolution. The documentation needs to be corrected to accurately describe the time unit resolution.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment.SignalExternalWorkflow data race on signal data
issues.author: Drahflow
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment.SignalExternalWorkflow has a data race when signal data is modified after being sent. A concurrent goroutine attempts to look up mock signals while the workflow modifies the signal payload, causing race conditions detectable with go test -race.

issues.title: Default MaxConcurrentEagerActivityExecutionSize to 3
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Set a sensible default limit of 3 for MaxConcurrentEagerActivityExecutionSize instead of unlimited, reducing resource consumption and improving default behavior alignment with other SDKs.

issues.title: Define an external type for internal.WorflowClient
issues.author: LXiao2015
issues.summary: User requests an external type for internal.WorkflowClient to enable mocking of ExecuteWorkflow in unit tests, similar to how internal.WorkflowRun is exposed as client.WorkflowRun.

issues.title: Ability to mock/intercept side effect calls in test suite
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add ability to mock or intercept side effect calls in the Go SDK test suite. Users need `TestWorkflow.OnSideEffect` and `TestWorkflow.OnMutableSideEffect` methods to control side effect behavior during testing.

issues.title: Change default Prometheus santitize options to not change values
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Default Prometheus sanitization options are altering metric label values by converting characters like dots to underscores, which breaks semantic meaning of workflow and activity names. The request is to stop modifying label values or make sanitization more permissive.

issues.title: Add activity.InActivity(context.Context) bool
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add an activity.InActivity(context.Context) bool function to determine whether a context is an activity context. This would allow developers to check if code is executing within an activity execution context.

issues.title: Fatal poll error on worker start isn't stopping activity poller
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activity worker poller fails to stop when the first poll operation encounters a fatal error (e.g., namespace not found). The issue may be resolved by reordering initialization steps in the worker base code.

issues.title: Heartbeats in test environment are not concurrency-safe
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The test framework's activity heartbeat mechanism is not concurrency-safe, causing race detector errors when multiple goroutines in an activity attempt to heartbeat simultaneously. The unsafe code is in getActivityHandle which was previously identified but never fixed.

issues.title: Worker fatal error can cause double worker stop
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Worker's Stop() method is not reentrant, causing a panic when called after a fatal error has already triggered worker termination. Users expect the stop to be idempotent without panicking.

issues.title: Tag new releases for contrib/opentracing and contrib/opentelemetry
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to create new version tags for contrib/opentracing and contrib/opentelemetry modules to release new features that have been added.

issues.title: Log warning on failed serialization of signal input
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Signals are silently dropped when they fail to deserialize, and there's no warning logged to alert developers. The request is to add warning logs for failed signal deserialization and document behavior in selectors when the receive callback occurs.

issues.title: github.com/uber-go/tally/v4-v4.1.1: 2 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Two high-severity vulnerabilities (CVE-2019-0210 and CVE-2019-0205) detected in github.com/uber-go/tally/v4-v4.1.1 dependency. Both are Apache Thrift vulnerabilities affecting Go JSON protocol implementations, causing potential panics and endless loops on invalid input. Upgrade to version 0.13.0 or later is recommended.

issues.title: golang.org/x/tools-v0.1.10: 3 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 6.1) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Three jQuery vulnerabilities in golang.org/x/tools-v0.1.10 dependency, including a medium-severity XSS issue affecting DOM manipulation. This issue was automatically closed by Mend as the vulnerable library was no longer part of the dependency inventory.

issues.title: golang.org/x/tools-v0.1.8: 4 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 6.1) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Four vulnerabilities detected in golang.org/x/tools-v0.1.8 dependency, primarily jQuery XSS issues with CVSS scores ranging from 5.3 to 6.1. The issue was automatically closed by Mend after the vulnerable library was removed from the inventory.

issues.title: Expose operator service
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to expose the raw operator service getter to the Go SDK client interface, allowing direct access to operator service functionality.

issues.title: New Tally contrib lib release
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request for a tagged release of the Tally contrib library to include changes from issue #756. The release was subsequently completed with tag contrib/tally/v0.2.0.

issues.title: TestSuite: Workflow names seemingly collide with activity names in mock expectations
issues.author: krousey
issues.summary: Workflow and activity methods with identical names collide in the test framework's mock system, causing incorrect mock signature validation errors despite the workflow executing correctly in production. The test framework doesn't incorporate type information when creating mock names, leading to ambiguity between methods with the same name in different contexts.

issues.title: independent lifecycles for cloned clients
issues.author: dnr
issues.summary: When using NewClientFromExisting, calling Close() on either the parent or child client closes the connection for both immediately, rather than having independent lifecycles where resources are only cleaned up when all references are closed.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add ability to support passing sessions from parent to child wf
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Feature request to enable passing open sessions from parent workflows to child workflows. Child workflows should be able to use sessions opened by the parent while they remain active, with the parent responsible for opening and closing the session.

issues.title: Remove poll failure log on explicit worker stop
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove unnecessary warning log that fires when a worker is explicitly stopped. Currently logs 'Failed to poll for task' with error 'worker stopping' even though this is expected behavior during graceful shutdown.

issues.title: Completed workflow not properly checking command/event mismatch for non-determinism
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Completed workflows are not properly checking for command/event mismatches when activities are replayed in a different order, allowing non-deterministic issues to go undetected. A conditional protecting against premature workflow completion is preventing determinism checks from running on completed workflows.

issues.title: Safer queries (and update validators)
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Query handlers can perform unsafe operations like starting activities, which violates read-only semantics. The solution involves accepting context as a parameter in query handlers while restricting its capabilities and adding static analyzer checks.

issues.title: Accept <- chan struct{} in Worker.Run
issues.author: alfa-alex
issues.summary: Feature request to change Worker.Run() to accept chan struct{} instead of chan interface{}, enabling direct use of context.Done() channels for shutdown signaling.

issues.title: Ensure slots available metric is updated on worker stop
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The slots available metric is not being properly removed when a worker stops, potentially causing incorrect slot accounting in monitoring and observability.

issues.title: High level API for schedules
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Review and finalize the Go SDK's high-level API for schedules before releasing to users. The server and tctl already use the Go SDK client's schedule functionality, but the API needs to be vetted for public use.

issues.title: Documentation fixes for error handling
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Documentation for error handling in the workflow package references a non-existent `error.CustomError()` function and lacks clarity on the mutual exclusivity of result and error in workflow run's Get method.

issues.title: panic if `Run` and `Stop` race
issues.author: twmb
issues.summary: Panic occurs when `Stop` is called before `Run` has fully started due to a race condition. The assertion in `AggregatedWorker.Run` fails if Stop executes before Start completes, causing a panic instead of returning an error.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment doesn't enforce WorkflowExecutionTimeout
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment doesn't enforce WorkflowExecutionTimeout on child workflows. Workflow execution timeouts are not being enforced during unit testing with testEnv.ExecuteWorkflow(), and error messages reference non-existent timeout types.

issues.title: Replayer uses different run ID than runtime after reset
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The replayer uses a different run ID source than the runtime after a workflow reset, affecting default child workflow ID generation. The replayer should be updated to use the runtime's run ID source for consistency.

issues.title: Make possible non-deterministic errors clear that's what they may be
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Non-deterministic workflow errors in the Go SDK should be clearly labeled as such. Currently, only one of three related errors mentions non-determinism, making it unclear to users that certain errors indicate non-deterministic behavior in workflows.

issues.title: Support creating new client from existing client's connection
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Users need to create a new client from an existing client's connection while changing non-connection options. The discussion explores design options and identifies a challenge with gRPC interceptors that set namespace metrics at dial time.

issues.title: Panic in eager activity code when RespondWorkflowTaskCompleted returns error
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: A panic occurs in eager activity code when RespondWorkflowTaskCompleted returns an error, because the code assumes a response is present without proper error handling. The fix should unreserve activity spots as if no tasks were returned.

issues.title: Cannot set really short max heartbeat throttle interval
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Context timeout with very short heartbeat throttle intervals causes immediate context expiration. Setting heartbeat throttle interval to very small values (like 1 nanosecond) causes the context to timeout immediately due to using `context.WithTimeout(ctx, i.heartbeatThrottleInterval)`.

issues.title: Record Reason Code for RPC Failure
issues.author: sjmtan
issues.summary: User requests that RPC failures in the Go SDK include reason codes or error type information to distinguish between business logic errors (like 404 NotFound) and actual service failures (like 500s). This would help them monitor Temporal Cloud connectivity and distinguish operational issues from expected application behavior.

issues.title: Panic with double stop on worker
issues.author: yux0
issues.summary: Calling worker.Stop() twice causes a panic when trying to close an already-closed channel. The issue questions whether Stop should be idempotent or if users should be responsible for tracking worker state.

issues.title: num_pollers metric
issues.author: robholland
issues.summary: Request to implement the num_pollers metric for the Go SDK to track the number of active activity and workflow pollers for cluster tuning and outage analysis.

issues.title: github.com/stretchr/testify-v1.8.0: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Dependency security vulnerability in testify v1.8.0's transitive dependency stretchr/objx v0.4.0 (CVE-2022-28948) causing potential DoS through unsafe YAML deserialization. Issue was automatically resolved when the vulnerable library was removed from the project's dependency inventory.

issues.title: sdk 1.15.0 seems to be incompatible with go.temporal.io/api v1.9.0
issues.author: c4milo
issues.summary: SDK v1.15.0 is incompatible with api v1.9.0 due to missing GetWorkerBuildIdOrdering method implementation in the workflow service proxy server.

issues.title: URL in metrics API 404s
issues.author: rachfop
issues.summary: Documentation issue: A code comment references a fully qualified function name (go.temporal.io/sdk/contrib/tally.NewMetricsHandler) that the issue author believes should be a direct URL to the Go package documentation. The maintainer clarified that function references are intentional, not meant to be URLs.

issues.title: Activity function alias lookup is done even on different task queue
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activity function alias lookup is incorrectly performed regardless of task queue, when it should only look up aliases in the local registry when executing on the same task queue.

issues.title: Document that valuePtrs passed to ch.Receive/ReceiveAsync or future.Get calls should not be re-used across calls
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Documentation should clarify that reusing output variables across multiple ch.Receive/ReceiveAsync or future.Get calls can cause unexpected behavior, especially with json.Unmarshal. Developers should declare fresh variables for each invocation.

issues.title: Document non-thread-safe callbacks in test suite
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add documentation clarifying that external mock callbacks for activities, local activities, child workflows, and external workflow operations run on separate goroutines and are not thread-safe, which may confuse developers writing tests.

issues.title: Support custom object processing in codec gRPC interceptor
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add custom payload processing support to the codec gRPC interceptor, allowing users to selectively skip processing for certain payload types (like headers) instead of processing all non-search-attribute payloads.

issues.title: Support github.com/golang/protobuf messageType name
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The SDK does not provide qualified proto message type names for the deprecated github.com/golang/protobuf library, only for the newer google.golang.org/protobuf. A dependency conflict prevents supporting the older library version.

issues.title: Can't check if a error is type ContinueAsNewError in Interceptor
issues.author: qiuyuzhou
issues.summary: User couldn't check if an error is a ContinueAsNewError in an Interceptor because the type was in the internal package and not publicly accessible. The issue was resolved by pointing out that ContinueAsNewError is already exposed in the public workflow package.

issues.title: Captures and reports panic/errors in an interceptor
issues.author: qiuyuzhou
issues.summary: User asks about implementing an interceptor to capture panics and errors from workflows and activities for Sentry integration, specifically questioning how to handle signal interception. The maintainer clarifies that signals processed through channels don't panic and error handling is not necessary for signal handlers.

issues.title: temporal SDK not compatible with temporal API v1.9.0
issues.author: gregorhollmig
issues.summary: Go SDK v1.15.0 is incompatible with temporal API v1.9.0 due to missing GetWorkerBuildIdOrdering method implementation. The issue was resolved by embedding UnimplementedWorkflowServiceServer to prevent new API changes from breaking older SDKs.

issues.title: Use interceptor logger for all logs related to a workflow or activity execution
issues.author: jlegrone
issues.summary: SDK debug and error logs don't respect the logger from the interceptor chain, preventing users from adding custom fields (like trace IDs) to all workflow/activity execution logs. Users need a way to inject context-aware logging across all SDK-generated logs, not just user-initiated GetLogger calls.

issues.title: Replay of Local Activities Executed by an Interceptor
issues.author: grantfuhr
issues.summary: Replaying workflows with local activities executed by interceptors causes panics due to missing interceptor execution during replay. The replayer does not run worker interceptors, leading to event mismatches between recording and replay.

issues.title: github.com/stretchr/testify-v1.7.0: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Dependency security vulnerability in go-yaml (transitive dependency via testify v1.7.0) with CVE-2022-28948 causing potential DoS through YAML deserialization crashes. Issue was automatically closed after the vulnerable library was removed from the inventory.

issues.title: attributes.GetNamespace undefined (type *command.ScheduleActivityTaskCommandAttributes has no field or method GetNamespace) (compile)
issues.author: Delicious-Bacon
issues.summary: Compilation error due to missing GetNamespace field in ScheduleActivityTaskCommandAttributes when using api v1.8.0 with sdk v1.14.0. The field was removed in a recent api commit, causing a version mismatch between sdk and api dependencies.

issues.title: Properly invoke worker OnFatalError callback for users of worker.Start()
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The OnFatalError callback in worker.Options was not being invoked for users calling worker.Start() directly, only for worker.Run(). This fix ensures the callback is properly triggered in both code paths.

issues.title: Workflow executionsRow not found
issues.author: CarlosEssun
issues.summary: Workflow with cron scheduler fails with 'Attempt to generate a command before processing WorkflowTaskStarted event' error when executing activities. User gets panic on cron-scheduled execution but same workflow runs fine when started manually.

issues.title: Workflow static analyzer tool raises non-deterministic error on workflow.AwaitWithTimeout
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: The workflow static analyzer tool incorrectly raises a non-deterministic error when using workflow.AwaitWithTimeout in workflows. This causes false positive warnings that prevent valid code from passing analysis.

issues.title: github.com/go-yaml/yaml-v2.4.0: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Dependency vulnerability in go-yaml/yaml v2.4.0 with CVE-2022-28948 causing denial of service through crash when deserializing invalid input. Fixed by upgrading to v3.0.0.

issues.title: Investigate how to unit test child workflows signalling a parent
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Investigation into unit testing child workflows that signal their parent workflow. The issue questioned whether parent execution info was properly accessible in unit tests and requested either support for parent workflow signaling or a way to configure parent execution info for testing.

issues.title: Terminated workflow fails replay
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Workflow replay fails when a workflow is terminated because the SDK lacks a switch case for the WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_TERMINATED event type. The termination event is not handled, causing the replayer to fail.

issues.title: workflowcheck not working
issues.author: gingercat-maki
issues.summary: workflowcheck tool fails to detect deadlocks and non-deterministic code violations when workflows contain sleep calls or other blocking operations. The tool should catch these violations but currently passes without errors, potentially masking runtime issues.

issues.title: Weird workflow task failure
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: A workflow task failure occurs after a schedule-to-start timeout, causing an 'activity ID not found' panic that retries 13,000+ times before mysteriously succeeding. The issue is difficult to reproduce and occurs across multiple workers despite identical binary checksums.

issues.title: OnUpsertSearchAttributes changes / additions
issues.author: gsmcwhirter
issues.summary: User requests changes to the OnUpsertSearchAttributes hook in TestWorkflowEnvironment to accept interface{} instead of map[string]interface{}, similar to OnActivity, to enable better mock argument matching and recording in workflow tests.

issues.title: Add ReplayWorkflowHistoryFromReader (or similar)
issues.author: gsmcwhirter
issues.summary: User requests new APIs ReplayWorkflowHistoryFromReader and ReplayPartialWorkflowHistoryFromReader to support reading replay histories from io.Reader sources, enabling use cases like go:embed, remote storage, and gzipped files.

issues.title: testsuite support restarting workflow if returned `NewContinueAsNewError`
issues.author: jackielii
issues.summary: User requested support for testing workflows that use `ContinueAsNewError` by adding an `EnableRunContinueAsNew` option to `TestWorkflowEnvironment` that would restart the workflow instead of returning the error.

issues.title: How can i get span trace id from workflow context?
issues.author: woyong
issues.summary: User asks how to extract trace IDs from workflow context for logging purposes, similar to how it's done in activities. The issue discusses the limitation that span context storage uses non-exported struct keys in the SDK.

issues.title: MutableSideEffect doesn't seem to work
issues.author: dnr
issues.summary: MutableSideEffect fails during workflow replay with payload decoding errors. The function works initially but crashes when workers are restarted and workflows are replayed, due to double-base64 encoding and improper command counter management during deterministic replay.

issues.title: Logs are not added to OpenTracing Spans when tracing is enabled
issues.author: pimvanhespen
issues.summary: Logs are not being propagated to OpenTracing spans when tracing is enabled in the Go SDK. The tracingWorkflowOutboundInterceptor ignores the TracerSpanRef parameter when calling GetLogger, causing logs to lose their tracing context.

issues.title: Access raw error message
issues.author: guptamridul1809
issues.summary: ApplicationError does not expose the raw error message; calling .Error() adds formatting details (error type and non-retryable status). User needs access to the raw message to pass to the UI.

issues.title: Change default gRPC max message size to 128MB
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Increase the default gRPC maximum message size to 128MB in the Go SDK to align with other Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: Deprecate NewClient, create Dial, NewLazyClient, and CheckHealth calls and support laziness
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Redesign client initialization to support lazy connectivity. Deprecate NewClient in favor of explicit Dial (eager) and NewLazyClient (lazy) constructors, with server capabilities fetched on-demand and a new CheckHealth method for health verification.

issues.title: Expose fatal worker error in some way and stop killing process
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Worker fatal errors currently kill the process without proper error handling or user notification. The request is to expose these errors through the Run call or add a WorkerFailureHandler option so users can handle errors without process termination.

issues.title: Allow getting workflow result to not follow runs
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Users want to retrieve workflow results without automatically following to the next run when `new_execution_run_id` is set. This is particularly important for cron workflows where users may want to get results from an older run rather than the latest one.

issues.title: workflow.GetLastError documentation is wrong
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Documentation for workflow.GetLastError is inaccurate. It incorrectly describes the function as extracting the latest failure from any previous run, when it should only extract the latest failure if the last run failed. Clarification needed for GetLastCompletionResult and API proto documentation.

issues.title: Task queue not recorded on temporal_worker_task_slots_available metric
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The task queue label is not being recorded on the temporal_worker_task_slots_available metric, preventing users from distinguishing metrics across different task queues.

issues.title: ReplayWorkflowExecution fails when history is too long
issues.author: vikstrous2
issues.summary: ReplayWorkflowExecution fails when workflow history spans multiple pages because pagination parameters are not properly utilized, causing 'extra replay command' errors.

issues.title: Potential issue with activity mocking and cancellation
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activities invoked with a cancelled context in the test environment were not respecting cancellation properly. Mocked activities could fail to return values on cancellation, and activities called for cleanup would execute despite the context being cancelled.

issues.title: github.com/golang/tools-v0.1.10: 3 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 6.1) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Dependency security vulnerability in golang/tools-v0.1.10 containing 3 jQuery XSS vulnerabilities (CVE-2020-11022, CVE-2015-9251, CVE-2012-6708) with CVSS 6.1 severity. Issue was automatically closed by Mend when the vulnerable dependency was removed from inventory.

issues.title: github.com/golang/tools-v0.1.8: 3 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 6.1) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: The golang.com/tools-v0.1.8 dependency contains 3 jQuery-related vulnerabilities (CVE-2020-11022, CVE-2015-9251, CVE-2012-6708) with CVSS scores of 6.1. This was an automated security alert that was auto-closed after the vulnerable library was removed from the WhiteSource inventory.

issues.title: Possible memory leak when loading a workflow with a query
issues.author: app/
issues.summary: Memory leak occurs when a workflow is queried before being cached, causing the workflow to be reallocated on each query and accumulating goroutines. The issue is caused by intentional design where query-only tasks are not cached, combined with a goroutine leak in the query handling logic.

issues.title: deadlock detected: workflow goroutine "root" didn't yield for over a second
issues.author: koolay
issues.summary: User encounters a deadlock error when using `time.Sleep()` in a workflow with a cron schedule. The error 'deadlock detected: workflow goroutine "root" didn't yield for over a second' occurs because blocking operations are not allowed in Temporal workflows.

issues.title: Move some data conversion out of the deadlock detection scope
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Data converters used in workflows are constrained by Temporal's deadlock detection timeout. Advanced use cases need the ability to perform data conversion outside this constraint, potentially by measuring conversion time and adjusting the deadlock detector timeout accordingly.

issues.title: Add TestActivityEnvironment.SetOnActivityHeartbeatListener
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: User wants to add SetOnActivityHeartbeatListener method to TestActivityEnvironment, similar to the functionality available in workflow environment for testing purposes.

issues.title: workflowcheck gets stuck forever when using templates in the workflow
issues.author: mbark
issues.summary: workflowcheck tool hangs indefinitely when analyzing workflow code that uses text/template, due to the tool's non-determinism analysis following recursive function calls through the template package.

issues.title: Add built-ins for workflow.NewUUID() and workflow.NewRandom()
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Request to add built-in helpers for workflow.NewUUID() and workflow.NewRandom() to make it more convenient for workflow developers. Declined because the SDKs use deterministic seeded pseudorandom instead of side effects, and adding these helpers would codify API differences across SDKs without consensus.

issues.title: Expose ApplicationError.msg
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Users request exposure of the raw message string from ApplicationError without the additional formatting that Error() method appends. The feature request is for a method like RawMessage() to access just the core error message.

issues.title: Sticky query invalid state machine transition error
issues.author: yycptt
issues.summary: Sticky queries can fail with invalid state machine transitions when the workflow cache is evicted on the server but the SDK rebuilds history that has since advanced beyond the original query's previousStartedEventID, causing outdated replay mode calculations.

issues.title: gRPC Proxy Integration Test
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Need to create an integration/end-to-end test for the gRPC proxy that uses a custom codec/converter with both client and worker to run a workflow.

issues.title: Allow lazy connection on client
issues.author: danielhochman
issues.summary: SDK removed lazy connection capability in v1.14.0 when getCapabilities call was added during client creation. User requests restoration of lazy connection option to prevent blocking service startup during deploy/scale events when Temporal server is unavailable.

issues.title: Sync metrics format with OpenMetrics and JavaSDK
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Go SDK metrics need to be reformatted to comply with OpenMetrics specification to achieve consistency with Java SDK, requiring counter metrics to have `_total` suffix and timer metrics to have `_seconds` suffix before bucket/count suffixes.

issues.title: lookup failed for scheduledEventID to activityID since 1.13.1
issues.author: kevinzhu-sa
issues.summary: Activity cancellation in workflows causes a panic with "lookup failed for scheduledEventID to activityID" error since version 1.13.1. The issue occurs when canceling activities within a signal handler, leading to a mismatch between scheduled event IDs and activity IDs.

issues.title: Concurrent map writes during deferred disconnected context cancellation
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Concurrent map writes occur during deferred disconnected context cancellation in the Go SDK, causing fatal runtime errors under high load. The issue manifests as a race condition during activity cancellation when context cleanup happens concurrently with command state machine operations.

issues.title: Fix docs for Client.ListWorkflow to clarify ES requirement
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Documentation for Client.ListWorkflow needs clarification about which operations require Elasticsearch. Currently the docs incorrectly state that ES is required for all calls, but some operations work without it.

issues.title: Execute local activity by string name fails during replay
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Local activity execution by string name fails during workflow replay. The issue appears specific to local activities registered by name rather than by function reference, causing replay to break when the activity is not available in the current registration context.

issues.title: Confirm that temporal_workflow_task_execution_failed is updated on data conversion failure
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Verify that the temporal_workflow_task_execution_failed metric is incremented when a data converter fails to convert workflow input, and confirm temporal_activity_execution_failed metric is properly updated on activity failures.

issues.title: Cannot use SignalWithStartWorkflow in tests
issues.author: nicolaferraro
issues.summary: User requested SignalWithStartWorkflow support in the Go SDK test suite. The feature exists in the client but lacks a direct testing equivalent, forcing users to rely on integration tests instead of unit tests.

issues.title: lookup failed for scheduledEventID to activityID
issues.author: alenkacz
issues.summary: Worker restart mid-session causes workflow to fail with a lookup error when trying to map scheduledEventID to activityID. The error occurs when a worker pod is killed during an active session, preventing the workflow from completing.

issues.title: Set WorkflowStartTime parameter in tests
issues.author: naormatania
issues.summary: WorkflowStartTime returns zero value in test workflows, making it difficult to test workflows that use this parameter for timing logic. Users expect test workflows to set WorkflowStartTime similar to how workflow.Now() works.

issues.title: Add Await branch to Selector
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Add an Await branch to Selector to allow waiting on conditions alongside Futures and Channels. This prevents users from accidentally mixing Await with Selector, which can lead to subtle bugs where timing expectations are violated.

issues.title: Activity cancellation causes history error
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activity cancellation in workflows with retries causes a BadRequestCancelActivityAttributes history builder error. When a parent workflow cancels child activities that have retry policies, the SDK generates invalid history state, leading to internal state errors.

issues.title: Unable to reset workflow with completed childworkflow whose child workflowID is generated by SDK
issues.author: yycptt
issues.summary: Child workflows with SDK-generated IDs fail to reset because the auto-generated ID is based on the original runID, which changes after reset. During replay, the workflow can't find the corresponding child workflow command, causing a non-deterministic error.

issues.title: CreateSession improperly retrying errors it should not
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: CreateSession activity was retrying on errors it should not retry, including timeouts. The issue requires disabling all retries on session creation activity and leveraging server-side changes to handle the 'too many sessions' case through max concurrent activities.

issues.title: Coroutine/context cancellation race conditions
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Data races in coroutine context cancellation when using WithCancel in workflows. Multiple concurrent goroutines access and modify context state without proper synchronization, causing race conditions during cancellation propagation.

issues.title: Worker silently doing nothing if MaxConcurrentWorkflowTaskPoller set to 1
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: Worker becomes unresponsive when MaxConcurrentWorkflowTaskPoller is set to 1 because it only polls from the sticky queue, preventing any workflow progress. The issue requires either smarter queue polling logic or enforcing a minimum concurrent poller requirement.

issues.title: Add metric for time passed from the activity scheduling to the last attempt
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Request to add a metric tracking time elapsed from activity scheduling to the last retry attempt, enabling users to set alerts for activities that keep failing. Current metrics only cover successful executions or single task execution, leaving a gap for monitoring failing activity chains.

issues.title: If a workflow is terminated while processing, it can leak coroutines
issues.author: aouji
issues.summary: Terminating a workflow while processing can leak goroutines that get stuck forever, particularly in complex DSL workflows with many parallel activities. The leaked coroutines remain blocked on channel operations and cannot be cleaned up.

issues.title: OpenTracing-enabled workers error when missing OpenTracing spans in headers
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: OpenTracing-enabled workers fail when OpenTracing span context is missing from headers, requiring workflows to be started with OpenTracing-enabled clients. This differs from OpenTelemetry's behavior which gracefully handles missing spans.

issues.title: Verify //workflowcheck:ignore works with Godoc
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The //workflowcheck:ignore comment directive appears to interfere with Godoc documentation generation in the Go SDK. Need to verify the interaction between workflow check directives and documentation tooling.

issues.title: Nested children in workflowcheck aren't showing the final leaf reason for non-determinism
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Workflowcheck's hierarchical tree for non-determinism detection only shows direct import reasons, not transitive ones. Nested children don't display the final leaf reason, limiting visibility into the root cause of non-determinism issues.

issues.title: Increase visbiility for poll failures
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Poll failures are currently logged only at DEBUG level after verbose logging is enabled. The request is to increase visibility by logging them at WARN level, specifically for connection failures.

issues.title: Make WorkflowServiceStubsOptions#rpcLongPollTimeout configurable
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Make the rpcLongPollTimeout configuration option available in WorkflowServiceStubsOptions for the Go SDK, similar to the Java SDK implementation.

issues.title: Add zap implementation of logger in contrib
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add a Zap logger implementation as a contrib module that provides a high-performance adapter using Zap's SugaredLogger for the SDK's log.Logger interface.

issues.title: Heartbeat timeout failure for async waiting activity
issues.author: zhishi
issues.summary: Async activities with heartbeat timeouts fail unexpectedly because external completion mechanisms cannot provide periodic heartbeats while waiting for manual input. User expects either automatic heartbeat generation for async activities or special handling to prevent timeout.

issues.title: Implement server capabilities and replace health check
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Replace health check with server capabilities lookup via getServerInfo to enable better error handling decisions. Remove health check options and use internal_error_differentiation capability to stop gRPC retrying internal errors.

issues.title: Static Analysis Tool for Non-Determinism
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request for a static analysis tool to detect non-determinism in Go workflows. The proposal includes moving existing temporal-determinist tool to the repo, integrating with golangci-lint and staticcheck.io, and documenting IDE integration with the ability to ignore specific calls or code sections.

issues.title: Allow "unable to find workflow type" error to be configured to hard-fail the workflow
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to make the "unable to find workflow type" error non-retryable and hard-fail the workflow, instead of allowing retries to support delayed worker deployments. The requester suggests implementing a catch-all workflow implementation pattern (#543) as a solution.

issues.title: Context aware data converter not getting context on local activity response
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Data converter WithContext is not being called for local activity response errors and marker details. The issue is complicated by the fact that errors and marker metadata use custom converters without context information during both serialization and deserialization.

issues.title: RetryPolicy not propagated on ContinueAsNew
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: RetryPolicy is not propagated when using ContinueAsNew, and there's no parameter to set it explicitly. The policy should either be automatically inherited or accepted as a configuration parameter.

issues.title: Change heartbeat failure log from debug to warn
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to change heartbeat failure log level from debug to warn to increase visibility of heartbeat failures in Go SDK.

issues.title: Support receiver-less method refs in OnActivity mocks
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Support for receiver-less method references in OnActivity mocks for Go. The incorrect syntax `OnActivity((*myStruct).MyFunc)` makes the receiver the first argument, while `OnActivity(new(myStruct).MyFunc)` works correctly with a receiver instance.

issues.title: `make test` fails
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: make test fails on macOS with a SIGABRT crash during test execution due to a known macOS-specific issue with the Go race detector. The issue was resolved by setting MallocNanoZone=0 environment variable before running tests.

issues.title: Manually returned activity cancel error without receiving a server-side cancellation
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activities can return CanceledError without server-side cancellation being received, causing incorrect RespondActivityTaskCanceledRequest to be sent. The enhancement proposes ensuring canceled errors are only sent when the server actually initiated a cancellation, wrapping other cases as retryable ApplicationFailure, and ensuring cross-SDK consistency with appropriate tests.

issues.title: Add SkipLogger interface for logger
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The Go SDK needs a SkipLogger interface to allow custom loggers to adjust caller skip levels during workflow replay, similar to the interface available in the Temporal server.

issues.title: Failed to test a activity with logger
issues.author: rainfd
issues.summary: User unable to test an activity that calls activity.GetLogger() because the activity context lacks the required activityInterceptorContextKey. The issue was resolved by using the testsuite package's TestActivityEnvironment instead of calling the activity directly with context.TODO().

issues.title: GetWorkflowError() does not yield stack trace for a panic
issues.author: modernplumbing
issues.summary: GetWorkflowError() doesn't expose stack trace information for workflow panics, requiring users to manually unwrap nested error types using undocumented patterns. The issue was resolved by suggesting users leverage Go's errors.As() function for cleaner error type assertion.

issues.title: Worker panics while executing activity
issues.author: tminusplus
issues.summary: Worker panics intermittently while executing activities in batched workflows with multiple concurrent activity executions. Issue appears related to race conditions during activity scheduling and processing on newly-scheduled workflows.

issues.title: Flaky tests with TestCustomResolver and TestOpenTelemetryTracing
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Two tests are flaky in CI: TestCustomResolver occasionally expects 1 but gets 2, and TestOpenTelemetryTracing sometimes has an extra span in the children array. Both failures suggest race conditions or timing issues in test execution.

issues.title: Document dangers with workflow.WithChildOptions and workflow.WithWorkflowRunTimeout using continue as new
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: WithChildOptions API misleadingly applies to general workflow options instead of just child workflows, affecting continue-as-new behavior and potentially surprising users. Documentation is needed to clarify this design and discourage context reuse.

issues.title: Specifying StartToCloseTimeout but no ScheduleToStartTimeout or ScheduleToCloseTimeout does not return an error
issues.author: tminusplus
issues.summary: Activity timeout configuration was confusing because the godoc comments didn't clearly explain that at least one of ScheduleToCloseTimeout or StartToCloseTimeout is required. The issue reporter thought both ScheduleToStart and StartToClose were required when ScheduleToClose was not provided.

issues.title: Allow disabling of function name aliasing during registration
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Function name aliasing during workflow/activity registration creates ambiguity and confusion. When registering with an explicit name, the function name is automatically aliased, causing unintended function references to match and test suites to execute unexpected workflows.

issues.title: How to provide an Authorization Token in Golang
issues.author: app/
issues.summary: User requests documentation on how to provide authorization tokens in the Go SDK, similar to the existing Java SDK documentation. The issue describes two implementation methods: using HeadersProvider or gRPC dial options with interceptors.

issues.title: Test activity start and complete between workflow schedule and start
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Go SDK experiences event ordering issues when an activity task starts and completes between workflow task scheduling and starting. A lookup error occurs trying to map scheduled event IDs to activity IDs in unexpected event sequences.

issues.title: Test and document exactly what contexts are cancelled on worker stop
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Clarify and document which contexts (workflow and activity context parameters) are cancelled when a worker stops, and ensure this behavior is properly tested. The issue was resolved by confirming that GetWorkerStopChannel provides during-stop handling and context cancellation handles after-stop-graceful-handling-timeout.

issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Issue placeholder requesting to move to the next item. Minimal content with no technical details.

issues.title: Allow channel to convert to same type set if pointer
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Channel Receive currently requires a pointer to a pointer when converting from a pointer type, but the feature request is to allow regular pointers for this conversion, similar to how futures already work.

issues.title: Add opentracing.MustNewInterceptor and opentelemetry.MustNewTracingInterceptor
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add Must-style convenience functions (MustNewInterceptor and MustNewTracingInterceptor) for opentracing and opentelemetry that panic on error instead of returning error values, since these functions don't typically fail in practice.

issues.title: Workflow ID cannot be set on testsuite with SetStartWorkflowOptions
issues.author: laniehei
issues.summary: The SetStartWorkflowOptions method in the test suite doesn't properly set the workflow ID when passed via the ID field. Users cannot rename workflows in tests because the ID option is ignored during ExecuteWorkflow.

issues.title: Possibility to deprecate attribute `Control`
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Exploration of deprecating the `Control` attribute used in signal external workflow and request cancel external workflow operations in the Go SDK. The `Control` field was inherited from Cadence SDK and contains an auto-incremented ID for internal state machine tracking, but its deprecation needs careful evaluation for compatibility concerns.

issues.title: gogo/protobuf is unmaintained
issues.author: pquerna
issues.summary: gogo/protobuf is unmaintained and the SDK should migrate to google.golang.org/protobuf. Migration is blocked on server-side changes, but there's debate about whether the performance concerns still apply for general-purpose worker clients.

issues.title: Heartbeat throttling interval should be configurable and default interval should be less than 10 minutes
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: The Go SDK's activity heartbeat throttling interval is hardcoded to 10 minutes, which is longer than other SDKs. This issue requests making the interval configurable and reducing the default to be more consistent across all Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: Mocked version of `ExecuteWorkflow` doesn't accept a custom Context
issues.author: dorsec
issues.summary: The mocked version of ExecuteWorkflow in the test suite doesn't accept a custom Context parameter like the production version does, making it difficult to test workflows that rely on context information such as user IDs.

issues.title: Expose local boolean from activity.GetInfo
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for exposing whether an activity is local in the Go SDK, bringing feature parity with Java SDK's activity.GetInfo API.

issues.title: Confirm support or lack of for multiple query return types
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The SDK's query response API only exposes a single value, but the query registration validates that there are exactly two return types with the second being an error type. This creates a disconnect between the validation rules and the available API surface.

issues.title: Update Tally to help statsd dependency
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Upgrade the Tally metrics library to a newer version that has resolved a statsd dependency issue, eliminating the need for users to maintain `replace` directives in their projects.

issues.title: Workflow panics after cancellation with clean up activity and child workflow
issues.author: nolotz
issues.summary: Workflow panics with 'lookup failed for scheduledEventID to activityID' when root workflow cancels an intermediate workflow that has a cleanup activity and child workflow. The panic occurs during event processing when the SDK fails to map scheduled event IDs to activity IDs.

issues.title: Inconsistent behavior when asserting invocations
issues.author: embano1
issues.summary: Mock assertion methods like `Once()` and `Twice()` in the Go SDK test framework show inconsistent behavior: panicking on over-invocation (which tests may pass) while failing on under-invocation, making the invocation count assertions unreliable for testing.

issues.title: Expose gRPC
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Expose the gRPC client and connection settings to users to provide greater flexibility in customizing gRPC behavior. Currently these are hidden from users, limiting their ability to configure advanced options.

issues.title: Workflows with too few parameters fail
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: ExecuteWorkflow with string name fails when passing fewer parameters than the workflow expects, causing a panic that regressed from a previous release.

issues.title: Document about and warn when attempting to use activity cancellation/heartbeats without HeartbeatTimeout
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activity cancellation and heartbeats don't work properly without HeartbeatTimeout set. Documentation needs clarification on the 10-minute batching default and its impact on cancellation timing.

issues.title: Add WorkerOption to disable workflow worker
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: Users need a way to start a worker for activity-only execution without registering workflow handlers. Request for a WorkerOption flag to explicitly disable the workflow worker component.

issues.title: Concurrent ExecuteWorkflow will gen same RunId
issues.author: franktz
issues.summary: User reported that concurrent ExecuteWorkflow calls generated the same RunID, but this was actually expected behavior where workflow IDs need to be unique and the default ID reuse policy creates new run IDs for failed workflows.

issues.title: Workflow API to check if ContinueAsNew is required
issues.author: rylandg
issues.summary: Request for a built-in API to help manage ContinueAsNew requirements for infinitely running workflows. Users currently need to implement custom wrappers to track action counts and history size to determine when to call ContinueAsNew.

issues.title: Should always Set RequestId
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: SDK inconsistently sets RequestId for API calls. Some operations like StartWorkflow set it, but others like SignalWorkflow and CancelWorkflow do not, creating risk of duplicate calls during retries.

issues.title: unhandled panic from workflow code
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: Unhandled panics from workflow code running in coroutines created by workflow.Go() cause crashes. The panic originates from a slice bounds check error in the stack trace generation code.

issues.title: Activity cancellation in certain scenarios causes event handling failure
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activity cancellation fails during event handling when unwinding, a regression introduced in v1.10.0. The issue occurs in specific scenarios when activities need to be cancelled and events must be properly handled during the unwinding process.

issues.title: Local activities do not catch panics
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Local activities do not catch panics, preventing proper retry behavior. Panics inside goroutines started by the local activity executor are not recovered, causing the worker to crash instead of handling the error gracefully.

issues.title: Make tracing tags consistent across SDKs
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Tracing tags are inconsistent across Temporal SDKs. This feature request seeks to standardize tracing tags across Java, TypeScript, Go, and other SDKs for consistent observability and monitoring.

issues.title: Fix worker.New docs
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Documentation for worker.New incorrectly references a non-existent namespace parameter. Additionally, the docs lack clarity about why creating a worker requires a client.Client instance.

issues.title: Better error message when calling activity with wrong number of parameters.
issues.author: finnigantime
issues.summary: User requested better error messages when calling an activity with the wrong number of parameters. Currently, the SDK silently accepts fewer parameters and only reports type mismatches on the first misaligned parameter, making debugging difficult.

issues.title: Investigate options around latency reporting and comparison with server
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Investigate discrepancies between client-side and server-side gRPC request latency measurements in the Go SDK. Proposed solutions include adding gRPC metadata with server-measured durations and exposing lower-level gRPC stats to identify whether differences stem from interceptor overhead or HTTP/2 message handling.

issues.title: Header support for signals and queries
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for header propagation in signal and query interceptors, matching the existing implementation for workflows and activities. This feature requires server-side changes and depends on related issues for completion.

issues.title: Testing cron child workflow with parent policy abandon runs forever
issues.author: tminusplus
issues.summary: Cron child workflows with PARENT_CLOSE_POLICY_ABANDON run forever in test environments due to auto-fire timers, causing tests to hang indefinitely until timeout. The test suite needs a way to terminate child cron workflows regardless of their parent close policy.

issues.title: Test activities with same name on different queues (run from the same workflow)
issues.author: lunne
issues.summary: User requests ability to mock activities with the same name on different task queues in test workflows. Currently, the testing framework cannot distinguish between identically-named activities running on different queues, forcing users to rename activities to disambiguate them in tests.

issues.title: Allow `EncodingDataConverter` to be context aware
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to make EncodingDataConverter and payload encoders context-aware to access contextual information during encoding. The feature was ultimately abandoned due to architectural constraints (avoiding circular package dependencies between converter and workflow packages).

issues.title: WorkflowRun.Get method should support a flag to disable long poll
issues.author: sbansal7
issues.summary: User requests a non-blocking variant of WorkflowRun.Get() that returns immediately instead of long-polling when the workflow is still running, to avoid blocking behavior and timeout issues on slower networks.

issues.title: Document/enforce `SignalWithStartWorkflow` does not use same workflow ID option as `ExecuteWorkflow`
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: SignalWithStartWorkflow accepts workflow ID in two different ways (parameter and options), but only uses the parameter form while ignoring the options form, creating a confusing API. The request is to document this behavior clearly and add validation to error when the options ID differs from the parameter.

issues.title: Support OpenTelemetry tracing
issues.author: avarabyeu
issues.summary: Replace deprecated OpenTracing API with OpenTelemetry API for distributed tracing support. The issue requests modernization to use OpenTelemetry instead of the superseded OpenTracing framework.

issues.title: Support workflow metadata query
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Request to support querying workflow metadata. This is a feature request blocked on SDK consensus across Temporal SDKs regarding how to expose workflow metadata query capabilities.

issues.title: Child workflow logger being output during replay
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Child workflow logger was reported to be outputting during replay, which should not occur as loggers should not log on replay. Upon investigation, the issue could not be replicated and was confirmed by the original user to not be an issue.

issues.title: Compression data converter
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Implement a data converter wrapper that compresses payloads using a customizable algorithm with configurable minimum size threshold. The converter must handle previously compressed data transparently and support both single Payload and multiple Payloads approaches.

issues.title: Expose health check on WorkflowClient
issues.author: Spikhalskiy
issues.summary: Users need a public method to check if the WorkflowClient's underlying connection to the Temporal server is healthy. Currently, a private checkHealth method exists but is not exposed for user-facing observability and auto-recovery use cases.

issues.title: Metric for determining task pool status
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request for metrics to monitor task pool status and worker capacity in the Go SDK. Users need visibility into how many concurrent tasks are running versus the maximum allowed to determine if their worker fleet is appropriately sized.

issues.title: panic: runtime error: index out of range [1532] with length 1532
issues.author: JunaidMkdn
issues.summary: Index out of range panic occurring in ringpop-go's memberlist iterator when accessing members. The panic happens at index 1532 with length 1532, indicating a boundary condition issue in the gossiping protocol.

issues.title: Activity mocking in test framework not able to do exact match of arguments
issues.author: roselander
issues.summary: Activity mocking in the test framework fails when attempting to match exact struct argument values. The mock library performs equality checks on pointers by memory address rather than value, causing mismatches for pointer fields in activity input structs.

issues.title: WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStarted error for child workflows should work with IsWorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError
issues.author: hungcs
issues.summary: IsWorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError does not correctly identify WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStarted errors that occur in child workflows. The error message indicates it's a workflow execution already started error, but the error type checking function returns false.

issues.title: Distribute pollers to multiple frontend servers.
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: Worker's multiple pollers share a single connection to only one frontend server, causing uneven load distribution. Feature request to distribute pollers across multiple frontend servers for better load balancing.

issues.title: Fix errors in documentation comments
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Documentation comments contain outdated error references (EntityNotExistsError, BadRequestError, InternalServiceError) from old Thrift API that no longer exist and need to be replaced with currently used errors.

issues.title: `temporal_activity_endtoend_latency` is not useful as-is
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: The `temporal_activity_endtoend_latency` metric is redundant and misleading, duplicating the sum of `activity_scheduletostart_latency` and `activity_execution_latency`. It should measure the time from when an activity was first scheduled to when it completed successfully, requiring a fix to use `GetScheduledTime` instead of `GetStartedTime`.

issues.title: NewWorkflowReplayer does not support custom data converter
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: NewWorkflowReplayer lacks support for custom data converters, preventing users from replaying workflow history with custom serialization logic.

issues.title: Temporal Client send signal to different namespace
issues.author: elb3k
issues.summary: The Temporal Go client can only send signals to workflows in the same namespace. The feature request asks for the ability to send signals to workflows in different namespaces, similar to the WithWorkflowNamespace option available within workflows.

issues.title: Dynamically adjusting MaxConcurrentActivityExecutionSize without restarting a worker
issues.author: pattersp
issues.summary: Request to dynamically adjust MaxConcurrentActivityExecutionSize without restarting the worker. Currently, this value can only be set at worker startup, requiring a full restart to change it.

issues.title: custom data converter is not correctly wired up for local activity
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: Custom data converter is not being applied to local activity results. When using a custom data converter in the SDK, local activity results are not converted through it, appearing as plain text instead of being properly serialized.

issues.title: missing default retry policy for local activity
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: LocalActivity is not retried when no retry policy is specified, relying instead on workflow task retries. The issue discusses whether this behavior should be changed and requests unit and integration tests to verify retry behavior for both local and remote activities.

issues.title: Provide more customizable history output
issues.author: lucperkins
issues.summary: User requests more customizable history output for workflows - the current GetWorkflowHistory output is difficult to manipulate into custom formats since HistoryEvent is directly derived from Protobuf definitions rather than being idiomatic Go structures.

issues.title: TestCancelTimerAfterActivity is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestCancelTimerAfterActivity test was experiencing flakiness with activity timeout errors during timer cancellation operations. The test has since stabilized and no longer appears flaky in CI.

issues.title: TestCancelChildWorkflowUnusualTransitions is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestCancelChildWorkflowUnusualTransitions test is flaky, causing intermittent test failures with assertion errors and panic(nil) runtime issues. The test was later confirmed to be stable in CI.

issues.title: TestBasic is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestBasic integration test is flaky, failing with counter value mismatch (expected 5 but got 9) and subtest panic errors. The test appears to have timing or execution order issues causing inconsistent results across runs.

issues.title: TestActivityNotRegisteredRetry is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestActivityNotRegisteredRetry test in the Go SDK is flaky, failing with inconsistent metric counts (expected 2 invocations but got 3). The test appears to have been resolved in CI according to later investigation.

issues.title: TestActivityNotRegisteredRetry is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestActivityNotRegisteredRetry test is flaky, failing intermittently with metric assertion errors. The test expects counter temporal_unregistered_activity_invocation to be 2 but gets 1, and sometimes fails with panic on parent test.

issues.title: TestAsyncActivityCompletion is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestAsyncActivityCompletion test was flaky in CI, sometimes producing only one asyncComplete result instead of the expected two. The test no longer appears to be flaky according to maintainer comments.

issues.title: TestActivityStartedAtSameTimeAsTimerCancel is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestActivityStartedAtSameTimeAsTimerCancel integration test was flaky, producing intermittent workflow timeout errors during execution. The test instability has been resolved and no longer appears in CI.

issues.title: TestActivityRetryOnTimeoutStableError is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestActivityRetryOnTimeoutStableError test was failing intermittently in CI with a WorkflowExecutionError when it expected nil. The test later stabilized and no longer appears flaky.

issues.title: TestActivityRetryOnStartToCloseTimeout is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestActivityRetryOnStartToCloseTimeout test was experiencing flakiness in CI, failing with unexpected ScheduleToClose timeouts during activity retry scenarios. The issue was later resolved and no longer appears in the test suite.

issues.title: TestActivityNotRegisteredRetry is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestActivityNotRegisteredRetry test was flaky, exhibiting non-deterministic behavior in the unregistered activity invocation counter metric. The test expected a counter value of 2 but intermittently received 1, indicating timing or race condition issues.

issues.title: TestActivityRetryOnError is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestActivityRetryOnError test is flaky, sometimes receiving only 2 retries instead of the expected 3, indicating intermittent issues with activity retry logic under test conditions.

issues.title: TestActivityRetryOnHBTimeout is flaky
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: TestActivityRetryOnHBTimeout integration test is flaky, failing intermittently with 'invalid activityID or activity already timed out' errors during activity retry attempts.

issues.title: Support dynamic activity and workflow implementations
issues.author: aschrijver
issues.summary: Request to support dynamic activity and workflow implementations that can be loaded at runtime, matching feature parity with the Java SDK.

issues.title: ContinueAsNew which transfers all unprocessed signals to new run
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Feature request to allow ContinueAsNew to automatically transfer unprocessed signals from the current workflow run to the new run, preventing signal loss when a developer fails to drain the signal channel before continuing.

issues.title: ByteSliceConverter should accept interface{} in FromPayload
issues.author: jackieli-tes
issues.summary: ByteSliceConverter panics when converting []byte payload to interface{} type, preventing activities from accepting bytes via the interface{} parameter pattern used for flexible payload handling.

issues.title: Redesign interceptors to match the Java / Node.js capabilities
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: The Go SDK's interceptor design lacks capabilities present in Java and Node.js SDKs. Interceptors cannot modify default SDK behavior, don't capture full operation spans for tracing, and some methods aren't properly chainable, limiting use cases like authorization and distributed tracing.

issues.title: clarify `ActivityOptions.ActivityID`
issues.author: jackieli-tes
issues.summary: Request to clarify and simplify the documentation comment for ActivityOptions.ActivityID field. The field already works as intended, so the comment warning against use should be updated to be clearer about when and why it should be used.

issues.title: Add open tracing support
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: Request to add OpenTracing support to the Go SDK for distributed tracing and observability. The feature is referenced in related discussion #515.

issues.title: Client interface comments don't mention Postgres
issues.author: bouk
issues.summary: Documentation for the Client interface mentions Cassandra and MySQL as databases where ListWorkflow will return BadRequestError, but does not mention Postgres. The issue asks whether Postgres should be added to this list or if ListWorkflow is actually supported on Postgres without Elasticsearch.

issues.title: Heartbeat data is not successfully recorded when an activity reports failure
issues.author: robholland
issues.summary: Heartbeat data fails to be recorded when an activity reports failure because the activity context is closed before the GRPC heartbeat request is sent. This causes heartbeat details to be lost on retry attempts.

issues.title: WORKFLOW_ID_REUSE_POLICY_ALLOW_DUPLICATE will replace a running workflow
issues.author: shiyao-afterpay
issues.summary: ExecuteWorkflow with WORKFLOW_ID_REUSE_POLICY_ALLOW_DUPLICATE was incorrectly replacing a running workflow instead of returning the existing workflow ID and run ID as documented.

issues.title: codahale/hdrhistogram repo url has been transferred under the github HdrHstogram umbrella
issues.author: filipecosta90
issues.summary: The codahale/hdrhistogram Go module dependency has been transferred to the HdrHistogram organization. The dependency URL needs to be updated to point to the new repository at github.com/HdrHistogram/hdrhistogram-go, which includes performance improvements in recent versions.

issues.title: Add Signal/Query interceptors
issues.author: vitarb
issues.summary: Add interceptor support for Signal and Query operations in the Go SDK. Currently, interceptors are not available for these operations, preventing fine-grained authorization and observability features like open tracing.

issues.title: TestActivityEnvironment.ExecuteActivity requires RegisterActivity when invoking activity by function
issues.author: dynajoe
issues.summary: TestActivityEnvironment.ExecuteActivity requires explicit RegisterActivity call when invoking activities by function reference, even though the activity instance is provided directly to ExecuteActivity. This forces unnecessary boilerplate in activity unit tests.

issues.title: Use `WORKFLOW_TASK_FAILED_CAUSE_NON_DETERMINISTIC_ERROR` for non-deterministic workflow
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Use the NON_DETERMINISTIC_ERROR cause when responding to workflow task failures due to non-deterministic workflow logic, aligning with Temporal server's error categorization.

issues.title: Non-retryable errors in sessions
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Sessions need support for non-retryable errors such as heartbeat failures and worker panics that shouldn't be retried since the worker state is lost. Cadence already supports this via retry policy settings for sessions, but the Temporal Go SDK does not.

issues.title: Unhandled timer fired commands during workflow cancelations can cause SDK to issue cancel cmd for already-resolved timer
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: The SDK incorrectly sends timer cancel commands for timers that have already fired during workflow cancellations, which violates the expected behavior that cancel commands should never be sent for already-resolved timers.

issues.title: Backoff poller on ResourceExhausted error
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: The poller uses an overly aggressive retry policy when encountering ResourceExhausted errors, instead of backing off as expected. The issue discusses whether ResourceExhausted should receive special treatment compared to other retryable gRPC error codes.

issues.title: [Bug?] Incorrect error `Call with too few input arguments` when activity uses the wrong context
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: Activity execution fails with misleading error message "Call with too few input arguments" when the wrong context type is passed to an activity. The error message doesn't clearly indicate that the context parameter is incorrect.

issues.title: [Test suite] Query after signal works in SDK, but not in Test Suite
issues.author: swyxio
issues.summary: Go SDK test suite cannot query a workflow after signaling it due to framework limitations, unlike real applications and other SDKs. This requires splitting signal and query operations into separate delayed callbacks in tests, which doesn't match real-world usage patterns.

issues.title: Add accessors for ActivityError fields
issues.author: aocole
issues.summary: ActivityError lacks public accessor methods for its fields like retryState, activityID, and event IDs. Users currently must parse the error string to extract these values. The request is to add getter functions for ActivityError fields and potentially for other error types as well.

issues.title: Calling `GetChildWorkflowExecution` for a mocked workflow in a test causes the runner to complete the child workflow.
issues.author: jmoseley
issues.summary: Calling `GetChildWorkflowExecution()` on a mocked child workflow in tests causes the child workflow to complete immediately instead of respecting the mocked delay. The parent workflow sees `IsReady() == true` immediately after calling `GetChildWorkflowExecution()` and sleeping, rather than waiting for the configured mock delay.

issues.title: Cannot reuse Workflow ID immediately
issues.author: si-stripe
issues.summary: Child workflows with the same workflow ID could not be reused immediately after the previous child completed, even with WORKFLOW_ID_REUSE_POLICY_ALLOW_DUPLICATE. The issue was caused by command state machine IDs depending only on the child's workflow ID, preventing reuse without unique IDs.

issues.title: Testsuite Workflow Retry not working
issues.author: leowmjw
issues.summary: TestSuite workflow retry mechanism is not functioning correctly. When a workflow returns an ApplicationError in the test environment, it should retry according to the RetryPolicy, but instead it only executes once and fails.

issues.title: data race in dispatcherImpl.ExecuteUntilAllBlocked
issues.author: ryanhall07
issues.summary: Data race condition in dispatcherImpl.ExecuteUntilAllBlocked where the executing state is written without a lock in a defer statement while being concurrently read by goroutines spawned via NewCoroutine, causing random test flakes.

issues.title: Propagation of cancellations to child workflows can cause state machine panic
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Child workflows fail to cancel when parent is cancelled, causing a state machine panic with invalid history builder state error. The issue appears related to activity task cancellation handling during child workflow termination.

issues.title: Workflow query hangs if the temporal workflow execution panics (is not available)
issues.author: ingyamilmolinar
issues.summary: Workflow queries hang indefinitely when the workflow execution is unavailable (e.g., due to panic) instead of timing out. The Go SDK lacks a default query timeout like tctl's 5-second default, causing client hangs.

issues.title: Canceling workflow can cause infinite replay attempts
issues.author: hungcs
issues.summary: Canceling a workflow can cause infinite replay attempts when a cancel event is processed before the corresponding activity completion event in the history, leaving the state machine in an invalid state and causing repeated BadRequestCancelActivityAttributes errors.

issues.title: Activity result is not stored (and continued) when stopping worker gracefully
issues.author: sev3ryn
issues.summary: Activity results are not stored when a worker is stopped gracefully during activity execution, causing the activity to restart from the beginning instead of continuing from where it was interrupted.

issues.title: Panic when querying during Workflow failure + retry
issues.author: leowmjw
issues.summary: A panic occurs when querying a workflow during failure and retry - the SDK attempts to generate a command before processing WorkflowTaskStarted event. This happens when queries are issued concurrently while the workflow is retrying after activity failure.

issues.title: Workflow replay is broken if workflow contains multiple subsequent calls to GetVersion
issues.author: mfesenko
issues.summary: Workflow replay fails with a panic when a workflow contains multiple consecutive calls to GetVersion. The panic occurs during event processing with a lookup error for scheduledEventID to activityID mapping, breaking query functionality.

issues.title: Test to support ParentClosePolicy
issues.author: yiminc
