issues.summary: The test framework does not respect ParentClosePolicy settings on child workflows. When a child workflow has ParentClosePolicy set to ABANDON, the test framework should allow the child workflow to continue executing after the parent closes, but currently it doesn't.

issues.title: Propgate Context Cancellations to Workflow Futures which are blocked on `Get(ctx, valuePtr)`
issues.author: daveworth
issues.summary: Feature request to propagate context cancellations to workflow futures via a new `WorkflowCancelingGet` method that cancels the underlying workflow instead of just unblocking the Get call. This would allow conventional context-aware cancellation patterns common in Go web applications.

issues.title: Vulnerability CVE-2021-3121
issues.author: W0nderMuffin
issues.summary: The gogo/status v1.1.0 dependency included a vulnerable version of gogo/protobuf (v1.2.0) affected by CVE-2021-3121, though the SDK's explicit go.mod dependency on v1.3.2 ensures the patched version is actually used.

issues.title: Activity stays in started state when ActivityType is not registered
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Worker silently fails activity tasks when the activity type is not registered, instead of immediately reporting an error. The activity remains stuck in the started state if the start_to_close timeout is large.

issues.title: Add workflow/activity error/panic worker hooks
issues.author: ingyamilmolinar
issues.summary: User requests worker hooks to capture workflow and activity panics/errors for error tracking services like Sentry. Currently only activities can be wrapped for error reporting, but workflows lack this capability.

issues.title: Retry Policy Loglevel
issues.author: lunne
issues.summary: Users need ability to control log levels for expected retry errors in activities. When polling external APIs with retries as part of normal operation, retry logs get spammed with messages for expected application errors that shouldn't be treated as error-level events.

issues.title: Default retry policy is not set in test framework
issues.author: yiminc
issues.summary: The test framework does not apply the default retry policy to activities when no explicit policy is set, unlike the production server behavior. Activities should use a default retry policy in unit tests as they do in production.

issues.title: TestWorkflowEnvironment: Fail RegisterDelayedCallback after ExecuteWorkflow
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: RegisterDelayedCallback should panic if called after ExecuteWorkflow to help users catch mistakes earlier. Currently users make this error and spend significant time debugging without clear feedback.

issues.title: temporal_activity_execution_failure Metric Doesn't Seem to Work
issues.author: sjmtan
issues.summary: The temporal_activity_execution_failure metric doesn't record activity execution failures. Activity errors return nil from the task handler, preventing the metric counter from being incremented when retryable errors occur.

issues.title: How to return `[]*proto.Message` from an activity?
issues.author: johanforssell
issues.summary: Activity returning a slice of protobuf messages loses nested message data during serialization/deserialization. Root-level messages are received but nested fields are nil.

issues.title: Activity Latency Metrics Missing Task Queue Name
issues.author: keelerm84
issues.summary: Activity latency metrics (activity_schedule_to_start_latency, activity_endtoend_latency) are missing the task queue name tag in the Go SDK, unlike the Java SDK implementation.

issues.title: worker.Start should fail after worker.Stop was called
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Worker.Start should fail (panic) after worker.Stop has been called, rather than allowing restart attempts that don't behave as users expect. Currently, users can call Stop then Start, but this doesn't properly restart the worker.

issues.title: maxRPCTimeout value is too long
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: gRPC RPC timeout values (10 seconds default, 70 seconds for long polls) are too long and cause excessive latency spikes when connections are abruptly severed during cluster maintenance or upgrades. The issue requests making the maxRPCTimeout configurable so users can adjust it based on their specific scenarios.

issues.title: Add support to de-register workflows and activities
issues.author: ingyamilmolinar
issues.summary: User encounters errors for previously registered activities that are no longer used by any workflows and cannot de-register them from workers. The error occurs on staging where old test workflows leave orphaned activity registrations.

issues.title: Reported Metrics around availability include initial retry failures even if final call succeeds
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Metrics reporting for gRPC calls to Temporal server include intermediate retry failures even when the final call succeeds, making the reported failure rate misleading. The request is to add a higher-level metric that excludes retries for ultimately successful calls while still including retry latency.

issues.title: Include a way to perform assertions on the workflow signal channel in the testing environment
issues.author: ingyamilmolinar
issues.summary: Request to add a method to access and assert on the workflow signal channel state in the testing environment. Users currently cannot verify whether all received signals were consumed by the workflow without modifying workflow code.

issues.title: Client creation doesn't have any retries if health check intermittently fails
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Client creation fails completely if health check intermittently fails with no built-in retry mechanism. Users must either disable health checks or implement retries in their application layer.

issues.title: Cancel activity context on service not being reachable
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Activity context is not canceled when the service is unreachable for the heartbeat timeout duration. Instead, the error is logged and a new heartbeat is issued, preventing activities from being notified about connectivity issues.

issues.title: Workflow panic due to potential deadlock detected when many goroutines are running
issues.author: bradleymcallister97
issues.summary: Workflow panics due to deadlock detection when many goroutines run concurrently. Users need to lower MaxConcurrentWorkflowTaskExecutionSize and MaxConcurrentActivityExecutionSize defaults, and request making the 1-second deadlock timeout configurable.

issues.title: Test environment `RegisterDelayedCallback()` with 0 duration which performs a query crashes
issues.author: vkarpov15
issues.summary: Querying a workflow inside RegisterDelayedCallback() with 0 duration causes a nil pointer dereference crash in the test environment. The query handler isn't registered in time when the callback executes immediately with 0 delay.

issues.title: JSON Serialization Errors From Activity Responses Fail Silently
issues.author: DannyHinshaw
issues.summary: Activity responses that contain non-serializable types like `error` fields fail silently with no worker log output. The JSON serializer successfully marshals the struct but fails to unmarshal it on the next workflow task, causing confusion for developers who must inspect the web UI to discover the issue.

issues.title: ActivityEndToEndLatency Incorrectly Recorded
issues.author: sjmtan
issues.summary: Activity end-to-end latency metric is incorrectly recorded using the poll start time instead of the actual activity task scheduled time, causing inaccurate latency measurements.

issues.title: Activity RetryPolicy MaximumAttempts behaves differently in workflow unit test compared to executing same workflow against real temporal server
issues.author: anz-rfc
issues.summary: Activity retry policy MaximumAttempts behaves differently in Go SDK workflow unit tests versus real Temporal server. When MaximumAttempts is set to n, unit tests execute the activity n+1 times instead of n times, causing a discrepancy in retry behavior.

issues.title: Test that an activity wasn't called
issues.author: app/
issues.summary: Test framework fails when asserting that an activity wasn't called. The mock setup using OnActivity().Panic() expects the activity to be invoked, causing the test to fail when the activity is correctly not called due to conditional branching.

issues.title: Workflow and activity with same name seems to confuse SDK
issues.author: laniehei
issues.summary: Workflow and activity with the same name may be confused by the SDK, causing the wrong function signature to be used when executing the activity.

issues.title: Invocation of struct local activities is broken.
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Invoking struct local activities fails with nil pointer dereference when passing method values like `a.GetGreeting`. The SDK cannot access the receiver pointer of method values to validate and invoke them correctly.

issues.title: [Bug] 13 INTERNAL: Failed to parse server response when local activity has only error return parameter and returns nil
issues.author: nirshirion
issues.summary: Local activities with only error return parameters that return nil cause a 'Failed to parse server response' error in the web UI, though the CLI displays the workflow history correctly.

issues.title: Get history size information in workflow
issues.author: daigx
issues.summary: User requests ability to access workflow history size information through workflow.GetInfo() to proactively detect when history size is approaching limits and decide whether to continue as new, avoiding history size exceeded errors.

issues.title: Error handling documentation outdated
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: The error handling documentation in workflow/doc.go is outdated and still references CustomError and GenericError which are no longer part of the current implementation. Documentation needs review to match actual implementation.

issues.title: Confusing Docs Around Reuse Policy
issues.author: sjmtan
issues.summary: Documentation for WorkflowIDReusePolicy and WorkflowExecutionErrorWhenAlreadyStarted is confusing because it doesn't clearly explain that reuse policy only applies to completed/failed workflows, and the parameter descriptions don't properly clarify when each applies.

issues.title: BackoffCoefficient must be defined and not defaulting to default value of 2.0
issues.author: cowell21
issues.summary: RetryPolicy's BackoffCoefficient field was throwing a validation error when not defined, despite documentation indicating it should default to 2.0. The issue was whether to fix the code to apply the default value or update documentation to indicate it's a required field.

issues.title: SDK Overview link in the about section on the right side of the repository is broken (page not found)
issues.author: loganintech
issues.summary: Documentation link in the SDK repository's about section points to a broken URL. The link to the Go SDK overview page was incorrect due to a typo in a redirect rule, which was subsequently fixed.

issues.title: ChildWorkflowExecution Future doesn't return error on WORKFLOW_ALREADY_EXISTS
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: ChildWorkflowExecution Future's GetChildWorkflowExecution().Get() call doesn't return an error when child workflow start fails with WORKFLOW_ALREADY_EXISTS error. The parent workflow blocks indefinitely instead of receiving the error.

issues.title: Multiple filter support on ListWorkflow client methods
issues.author: ingyamilmolinar
issues.summary: ListClosedWorkflow only supports a single filter, requiring inefficient workarounds to query with multiple conditions like type and status. The request is to support multiple filters in List*Workflow methods for more efficient queries.

issues.title: Activity Retry Policy is ignored in workflow tests
issues.author: ingyamilmolinar
issues.summary: Activity retry policy is not respected in workflow test environments. When testing workflows with activities that have a retry policy, the test framework fails to retry activities on failure, causing tests to incorrectly report workflow errors.

issues.title: Struct pointer to Activities is nil when executed using ExecuteLocalActivity
issues.author: ghstahl
issues.summary: ExecuteLocalActivity results in the activity struct pointer being nil when the activity is registered as a struct instance, while ExecuteActivity works correctly. This causes panics when the activity method tries to access receiver fields.

issues.title: Setting deadlock detection timeouts?
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: Deadlock detection timeout is triggered when executing long-running operations like RSA key generation in workflows/side effects, causing unnecessary restarts. User requests API to extend or control the deadlock detection timeout for specific operations.

issues.title: Can't use `errors.Is` to check a returned error
issues.author: esdrasbeleza
issues.summary: Activity errors returned as custom error types cannot be checked using `errors.Is()` because errors are wrapped in ApplicationError when crossing process boundaries. The issue involves confusion about which methods exist for accessing original error information.

issues.title: CancelWorkflow() should return EntityNotExistsError error if workflow does not exist
issues.author: ingyamilmolinar
issues.summary: User reported that CancelWorkflow() returns *serviceerror.NotFound with a generic 'sql: no rows in result set' message instead of EntityNotExistsError when a workflow doesn't exist. Discussion clarified this was a misunderstanding about Go error handling patterns rather than an actual bug.

issues.title: Add support for querying child workflows in unit tests
issues.author: nadilas
issues.summary: Request to add QueryWorkflowByID method to TestWorkflowEnvironment for querying child workflows in unit tests. This feature enables developers to verify child workflow behavior within test scenarios.

issues.title: Add validation of input addr during client creation
issues.author: wxing1292
issues.summary: Client creation does not validate the input address (host:port) format, causing cryptic connection errors later when the invalid address is used. Validation should occur during client initialization rather than at connection time.

issues.title: Registering activities by struct is weird in 1.5.0
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: In SDK 1.5.0, registering activities as struct methods without explicit naming causes conflicts between structs with identically named methods, and ExecuteActivity cannot find activities even when registered with a Name prefix. This differs from 1.4.1 where struct method naming scoping worked automatically.

issues.title: Workflow panics after cleanup activity, if cancel occurs during workflow sleep
issues.author: chooilow
issues.summary: Workflow panics with an illegal state error when cancel occurs during workflow sleep, followed by a cleanup activity execution. The panic indicates a failure to lookup the scheduled event ID to activity ID mapping, leaving the workflow stuck in Running state instead of transitioning to Canceled.

issues.title: Add an ApplicationErrorBuilder
issues.author: sjmtan
issues.summary: Feature request to add an ApplicationErrorBuilder for Go SDK that uses method chaining to construct ApplicationError instances more concisely than the current NewApplicationError function.

issues.title: Workflow panic when querying a workflow using a side effect inside a versioned block
issues.author: MrSaints
issues.summary: Workflow panics when a SideEffect is used inside a versioned block during query execution. The panic occurs with the error 'lookup failed for scheduledEventID to activityID', preventing newly launched workflows from being queried even though the workflow itself completes successfully.

issues.title: [Bug] Local Activities fail to deserialize at gRPC if return type is error
issues.author: vavsab
issues.summary: Local activities that return only an error type fail to deserialize in temporal-web due to nil values in gRPC MarkerRecordedEvent payloads. The issue occurs when activities have no return value besides an error parameter.

issues.title: Tracer do not export workflow trace
issues.author: nicolasgere
issues.summary: Tracer is not exporting workflow traces, only child activity traces are captured. Workflow-level traces should be available with activities as child traces.

issues.title: Add deterministic range over map helper
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Go's built-in map range iteration is non-deterministic, requiring users to implement workarounds. This request asks for a helper function to support deterministic iteration over maps.

issues.title: [Bug] the json input is invalid in the workflow history and with a wrong encoding for accents
issues.author: lerminou
issues.summary: JSON input payloads in workflow history are invalid and improperly encoded, with special characters like accents being escaped as Unicode sequences instead of being preserved correctly. This affects debugging through the Temporal Web UI and history API calls.

issues.title: Registering Activity Fails Silently When Function Doesn't Match Signature
issues.author: sjmtan
issues.summary: Activity registration in the Go SDK fails silently when struct methods don't conform to the expected activity signature, processing methods up until the non-conforming one without any error or warning.

issues.title: Allow string activity names in `workflow.ExecuteLocalActivity`
issues.author: benjaminsky
issues.summary: Request to allow string activity names in `workflow.ExecuteLocalActivity` to support DSL use-cases without requiring reflection-based implementations or multiple file changes.

issues.title: Allow the injection of additional grpc client interceptors
issues.author: jmcnevin
issues.summary: Feature request to allow injection of additional gRPC client interceptors to enable custom authorization metadata in outgoing requests. User has forked the SDK to add a CredentialsInterceptor to ConnectionOptions but seeks the Temporal team's preferred approach.

issues.title: ReplayLogger.With doesn't expand keyvals variadic function parameter
issues.author: smkent
issues.summary: ReplayLogger.With doesn't properly expand the variadic keyvals parameter when passing arguments to the underlying logger, causing all arguments to be passed as a single array instead of separate arguments.

issues.title: [Testing] Cancellation of Parent Workflow with Child Workflow Panics
issues.author: sjmtan
issues.summary: When canceling a parent workflow through a mocked child workflow, the parent workflow panics instead of returning a cancellation error. The test framework doesn't properly propagate cancellation from child to parent workflows.

issues.title: regarding change in inputs of running workflow
issues.author: ru90
issues.summary: User asks whether they can change the input of a running workflow using signals, and requests example code. The issue was redirected to the community forum as it's a usage question rather than a bug or feature request.

issues.title: RequestCancelExternalWorkflow(...).Get(ctx, nil) blocks forever with workflow exits with ErrCanceled
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: RequestCancelExternalWorkflow().Get(ctx, nil) blocks forever when the canceled workflow returns ErrCanceled, but works correctly when it returns nil. When a variable is passed to Get() instead, it returns properly but the error value is nil.

issues.title: Invalid state transition panic when cancelling a child workflow, and a parent workflow consecutively
issues.author: MrSaints
issues.summary: A panic occurs when cancelling a child workflow followed immediately by cancelling the parent workflow, with an invalid state transition error in the workflow state machine.

issues.title: Don't Require mock.Anything For context.Context Activity Parameter
issues.author: sjmtan
issues.summary: Feature request to make context.Context an implicit/optional parameter in activity mocks so users don't have to explicitly pass mock.Anything for it, similar to how it's automatically propagated during execution.

issues.title: Original Failure source is lost when ConvertFailureToError invoked
issues.author: wolfy-j
issues.summary: The ConvertFailureToError function incorrectly overwrites the original failure source with 'GoSDK', losing important diagnostic information about where the failure actually originated.

issues.title: Potential deadlock detected: workflow goroutine "root" didn't yield for over a second
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: ExecuteLocalActivity() calls trigger a deadlock detection panic in SDK v1.3.0, occurring in ~90% of cases. The issue is caused by the new deadlock detector firing when workflow threads are blocked (e.g., by debuggers), rather than a genuine deadlock condition.

issues.title: Registering workflows by struct
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: User requested the ability to register workflows by struct (similar to activity registration) to avoid naming collisions when multiple packages contain workflows with the same function name. The SDK currently only uses function names without package context, causing panics on duplicate names.

issues.title: Logrus maintaince mode
issues.author: reidlai
issues.summary: User inquires about adopting Zap logger instead of Logrus, which is in maintenance mode. Issue was resolved when user discovered Logrus adapters can be used with Temporal.

issues.title: Allow including local activity input into the history
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Feature request to add a LocalActivityOption to exclude local activity input arguments from history events. Local activities used for state logging generate large histories unnecessarily storing input data that's only for human consumption and not used by the SDK.

issues.title: relation "schema_version" does not exist on fresh postgresql DB
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: PostgreSQL database initialization fails on fresh setup with 'relation schema_version does not exist' error. The AUTO_SETUP feature is unable to properly create required database schema during startup with CockroachDB as the backing store.

issues.title: Custom error types inaccessible as they are defined in internal package
issues.author: shaunco
issues.summary: User reported that custom error types defined in the internal package were inaccessible from external modules despite documentation suggesting they should be available. The issue was resolved when the author discovered the error types were also exported in the public temporal package.

issues.title: Add Selector.HasPending
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Feature request to add Selector.HasPending method that checks if there are pending items without blocking, simplifying workflow completion logic that needs to drain all signals before returning.

issues.title: Data race on cache eviction
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Data race condition on cache eviction where a goroutine writes to coroutine state while another reads it during workflow cache cleanup. This causes concurrent access to the same memory location without synchronization.

issues.title: [doc] Should remove all activity.Register in document
issues.author: giautm
issues.summary: Documentation contains outdated references to activity.Register that should be removed. The API has evolved and these examples are no longer accurate or recommended.

issues.title: Expose previous run failure though workflow context API
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Feature request to expose the failure of a previous workflow run through the workflow context API. Currently, getLastCompletionResult is available to communicate previous run results, but there's no equivalent API to access the failure details when continueAsNew occurs due to cron or retry policies.

issues.title: Add the ability to register local activities only
issues.author: wolfy-j
issues.summary: Feature request to register local activities only without enabling regular task queue activity consumption. Users want to isolate workflow workers from business logic while still using local activities.

issues.title: Add a Registry/WorkerRegistry interface to the worker package
issues.author: sagikazarmark
issues.summary: Request to create a Registry interface in the worker package containing only registration methods for workflows and activities, allowing consumers to avoid depending on the full Worker interface with Start/Stop methods.

issues.title: StartWorkflow and OnWorkflowTaskStarted triggered twice on the same worker on QueryWorkflow
issues.author: wolfy-j
issues.summary: StartWorkflow and OnWorkflowTaskStarted are triggered twice on the same worker during QueryWorkflow, causing workflow state corruption when using extension APIs with external memory.

issues.title: Expose access to grpc.ServiceClient so we can create default golang client and get access to underlying GRPC client
issues.author: wolfy-j
issues.summary: Feature request to expose access to the underlying gRPC ServiceClient in the Go SDK to enable creation of default clients and access to low-level gRPC functionality, particularly needed for SDK code generation like in the PHP SDK.

issues.title: Reduce the severnity of "no activities/workflow registered" message by Temporal worker
issues.author: wolfy-j
issues.summary: Worker logs verbose 'no activities/workflow registered' messages at INFO level when running separate workers for activities and workflows. Request to reduce log severity to DEBUG level to reduce noise.

issues.title: If a retryable workflow returns a non-retryable error that was originally returned by an activity, the workflow still gets retried
issues.author: umran
issues.summary: When a workflow with a retry policy receives a non-retryable error from an activity, the workflow incorrectly gets retried despite the error type matching the NonRetryableErrorTypes specification. The error originating from the activity is not being properly recognized as non-retryable at the workflow level.

issues.title: Get RunId using WorkflowClient
issues.author: agnithin
issues.summary: Feature request to add a WorkflowClient method for retrieving the RunId of a workflow, eliminating the need to call the lower-level DescribeWorkflowExecution API for this common operation.

issues.title: Add ability to reject ExecuteWorkflow call on duplicated workflow
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: When WORKFLOW_ID_REUSE_POLICY_REJECT_DUPLICATE is set, ExecuteWorkflow returns the previous workflow result instead of rejecting the duplicate call. Users need an option to force returning WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStarted error to detect duplicate calls.

issues.title: Expose activity start and completion information to the workflow code
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to expose activity start and completion information (timestamps, attempt numbers, etc.) to workflow code so developers can access metadata about activity execution lifecycle.

issues.title: Add ActivityInterceptor
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Go SDK lacks an ActivityInterceptor feature that exists in the Java SDK. This feature would enable logging, tracing, and other cross-cutting concerns for activity execution.

issues.title: Retrieved String Search Attribute includes quotation characters
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: String search attributes in the Go SDK are including unwanted quotation characters in retrieved values. This is a bug related to how search attribute values are formatted or escaped.

issues.title: Support proto structs generated by google proto compiler
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Google protocol buffer compiler-generated structs are not fully supported by the SDK, unlike gogo-generated structs. This causes issues with enum serialization when using google protobuf in activity arguments.

issues.title: Tracer property in WorkerOptions is missing
issues.author: 0x5487
issues.summary: Documentation claimed Tracer property was available in WorkerOptions, but it was actually removed and only available in ClientOptions. User reported missing tracer support and confusion about trace span relationships when using OpenTelemetry.

issues.title: RecordActivityHeartbeat signature should be modified to return an error if activity has been canceled
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: RecordActivityHeartbeat should return an error if the activity has been canceled, instead of being a no-op. Currently users must manually select on the context to check if it's done.

issues.title: panic: proto: duplicate extension registered
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: Duplicate protobuf extension registration panic occurs when using Temporal SDK with conflicting protobuf dependencies. Multiple transitive dependencies (envoyproxy/protoc-gen-validate, cncf/udpa) register the same gogo.proto extensions, causing initialization failure in Go applications.

issues.title: Deprecate and remove disable sticky execution flag
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Remove legacy code related to the disable sticky execution flag. The sticky execution feature is now standard and the backwards compatibility code for disabling it is no longer needed.

issues.title: Workflow hangs if we try to run two local activities in parallel
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Local activities executed in parallel cause workflow to hang because they are incorrectly assigned the same activity ID. The ID counter is only incremented after a local activity completes, not when they start.

issues.title: Unable to get WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError
issues.author: olegmedvedev
issues.summary: ExecuteWorkflow does not raise WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError when a workflow with the same ID is restarted using WORKFLOW_ID_REUSE_POLICY_ALLOW_DUPLICATE_FAILED_ONLY. The error is silently consumed and an existing WorkflowRun is returned instead.

issues.title: Cancellation of Child Workflows leads to an apparent deadlock
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Child workflow cancellation causes an apparent deadlock in the Go SDK, preventing workflow execution from completing normally when cancelling child workflows in a pandemic test scenario.

issues.title: Unix specific API breaks windows development
issues.author: jarnett
issues.summary: syscall.Kill is undefined on Windows, breaking compilation of the Go SDK on Windows platforms. The code uses Unix-specific syscall APIs without platform-specific guards.

issues.title: Add support for doing backward incompatible changes to workflow and activity function signatures
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request for a mechanism to support backward-incompatible changes to workflow and activity function signatures while maintaining compatibility with callers using the old signatures.

issues.title: Go SDK does not handle two different workflows registered with same function name properly
issues.author: mastermanu
issues.summary: Go SDK incorrectly handles ContinueAsNew when two workflows in different packages have the same function name, causing the wrong workflow to be executed. The SDK should either crash on startup if duplicate function names are registered or properly differentiate between them.

issues.title: Support seamless cleanup during session cancellation
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to support graceful cleanup logic execution within sessions during workflow cancellation, currently requiring ugly workarounds. Users need better control over session lifecycle to handle cleanup when workflows are cancelled.

issues.title: Add ability to register a single generic workflow and activity implementation for multiple types
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to support generic workflow and activity implementations that can handle multiple types dynamically. This would enable frameworks built on top of the Go SDK (like the proposed PHP SDK) to load and unload implementations at runtime without restarting the worker.

issues.title: testsuite context propagation is broken
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Context propagation is broken in the test suite. The code path that extracts headers from context passed to testWorkflowEnvironment.Execute is missing, preventing context propagators from working correctly during unit tests.

issues.title: Worker reports validation error on processing of transient decision
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Worker reports a 'premature end of stream' validation error when processing a transient decision that is scheduled after a decision failure. The error indicates a mismatch between expected and actual event IDs in the workflow history.

issues.title: Report connection issues in more user friendly way
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Worker fails to connect to Temporal server with unclear namespace error messages. The feature request asks for better error handling that checks the connection before starting the worker and provides a clear, user-friendly error message like 'Unable to connect to Temporal server at localhost:7233'.

issues.title: Add ability for a clean worker shutdown that waits for a session completion.
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for clean worker shutdown that waits for activity sessions to complete, not just individual activities. Currently worker.Close() waits for running activities, but users need to wait for entire sessions that execute multiple activities.

issues.title: Accept a Logger interface instead of *zap.Logger
issues.author: amitmahbubani
issues.summary: Request to accept a Logger interface instead of requiring *zap.Logger in ClientOptions, allowing users to provide custom logging implementations without forcing zap as a dependency.

issues.title: NewNonRetryableApplicationError not respected by
issues.author: moh-abk
issues.summary: NewNonRetryableApplicationError is not being respected and activities are still retried despite the flag. The issue occurs when an error (cause) is passed to the constructor, but works correctly when nil is passed.

issues.title: Activity times out in test environment with child workflow
issues.author: nirshirion
issues.summary: Activities timeout incorrectly in test environments when called from child workflows, returning StartToClose timeout errors even though sufficient timeout is configured. The issue occurs when ScheduleToCloseTimeout is uninitialized while ScheduleToStartTimeout and StartToCloseTimeout are set.

issues.title: mocks.Client is broken
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: mocks.Client doesn't implement the client.Client interface, making it unsuitable for mocking the client in tests.

issues.title: Namespace registration returns: unknown service
issues.author: hazcod
issues.summary: Namespace registration fails with 'unknown service' error when using mismatched versions of Go SDK libraries and temporal-proto, or when unable to connect to the Temporal frontend service.

issues.title: Race in Register...WithOptions due to un-protected map read
issues.author: Groxx
issues.summary: Race condition in Register*WithOptions functions due to unprotected map reads. The issue parallels a similar bug in the parent Cadence project where concurrent access to a map without synchronization causes data races.

issues.title: Support returning WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError in tests
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to support returning WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStartedError in tests. The issue references a Cadence client PR and was resolved by a specific commit that addressed this test functionality.

issues.title: Support passing activityId to an activity invocation
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Support for specifying a custom activity ID during activity invocation to enable asynchronous activity completion by ID. Discussion revealed this feature may already be implemented via ExecuteActivityOptions.ActivityID.

issues.title: Enable ContextPropagator for ExecuteLocalActivity
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: ContextPropagator is not invoked for ExecuteLocalActivity, only for ExecuteActivity. This prevents proper context propagation in local activity execution.

issues.title: Add autoheartbeating of activities
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to add automatic heartbeating for long-running activities to detect worker liveness without requiring manual heartbeat implementation. Feature was previously available in Cadence and would simplify activity implementation.

issues.title: Remove need to register mocked activity
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Activity mocking in tests currently requires registering a dummy activity implementation beforehand, which is unintuitive and cumbersome. The user requests removal of this requirement for a better testing experience.

issues.title: Activity error is lost when ScheduleToCloseTimeout is expired during retries
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Activity error information is lost when ScheduleToCloseTimeout expires during retries. Currently, the system returns a generic ScheduleToClose timeout error instead of preserving the original activity error, making it difficult for developers to understand what actually failed.

issues.title: ChildWorkflow inherits WorkflowRunTimeout from parent
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Child workflows incorrectly inherit the parent's WorkflowRunTimeout instead of defaulting to their own WorkflowExecutionTimeout. This causes child workflows to have unexpectedly short run timeouts even when explicitly configured with longer execution timeouts.

issues.title: Selector should match closed channel once
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Selector incorrectly loops forever when a closed channel is received instead of matching it once like it does for Futures. The AddReceive handler should only fire once when a channel is closed, not continuously.

issues.title: Fix race condition in testWorkflowEnvironmentImpl
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Race condition exists in testWorkflowEnvironmentImpl that is currently bypassed by a workaround. The issue needs to be properly fixed rather than worked around.

issues.title: Panic in serviceerror.FromStatus
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: A panic occurs in serviceerror.FromStatus when converting a gRPC status with a NotFound detail that the service doesn't properly include. The interface conversion fails because it tries to cast a nil value to *failure.NotFound.

issues.title: Add ability to pass Channel as a parameter to Child workflow and activity
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Users cannot pass workflow Channels as parameters to child workflows and activities because Channel is not a value type. The proposal is to pass channel ID information to activities and use SignalWorkflow calls to communicate back to the workflow.

issues.title: Remove error from WorkflowClient.CloseConnection
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Remove the error return value from WorkflowClient.CloseConnection and rename it to Close, as the error is not useful in practice.

issues.title: Go SDK meta tag resolution not working properly
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: The Go SDK's meta tag resolution doesn't work for subpackages like `go.temporal.io/temporal/worker`, only for the root package. The `go get` command requires proper `<meta>` tags for package discovery, which need to be provided at every package level.

issues.title: Worker Start/Stop behavior
issues.author: sagikazarmark
issues.summary: Worker start/stop behavior should allow callers to handle signal listening separately. The issue requests a design more aligned with a worker actor pattern similar to appkit, where signal handling is decoupled from worker lifecycle management.

issues.title: Build of the freshly checked out repo fails
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Build fails on freshly cloned repository due to errcheck tool finding an unclosed file handle in the copyright license generation tool.

issues.title: Refactor SDK to avoid type aliasing
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Current SDK uses type aliasing to separate internal and public APIs, which causes problems with Go tooling. The proposal is to create public copies of interfaces and structures with casting between internal and public versions.

issues.title: Add ability to call healthcheck from WorkflowClient
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Customer requests a health check feature for WorkflowClient to verify connectivity to Temporal frontends without executing workflows. Currently, no error is returned until actual workflow operations are attempted.

issues.title: Add ability to not log errors from activities
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to suppress logging and metrics for activity errors that are handled gracefully by workflows. Users want to avoid noisy error logs for expected error scenarios that are subsequently handled via ContinueAsNewError or similar patterns.

issues.title: Remove WorkerOptions.Disable[Activity|Workflow]Worker option
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Remove the WorkerOptions.Disable[Activity|Workflow]Worker option as it's no longer needed. Both activities and workflows are now registered directly with the worker, making this option redundant.

issues.title: Test_WorkflowLocalActivityWithMockAndListeners is flaky
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Test_WorkflowLocalActivityWithMockAndListeners test is flaky, occasionally failing with assertion errors about expected vs actual counts and listener state. The test passes reliably after a few restarts.

issues.title: Add code linting to the SDK
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Request to add a linter for the Go SDK to check for common mistakes that violate SDK-imposed restrictions in workflow and activity implementations. Resolved by implementing the workflowchecker tool in contrib/tools.

issues.title: Refactor NewWorker and remove downcast
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: NewWorker has a downcast and panic that needs to be refactored and removed. Users cannot wrap the temporal client with custom implementations due to worker needing internal client details.

issues.title: Remove mocks package
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Remove the mocks package that uses mockery and replace it with gomocks, which is used everywhere else in the codebase. Customers can generate mocks themselves using the mockgen tool.

issues.title: Migrate service_wrapper_test to interceptor_test
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Migrate service_wrapper_test to interceptor_test after service_wrapper was replaced with gRPC interceptor in #58. Tests need to be updated to reflect the architectural change.

issues.title: Add workflow deadlock detector
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Add a workflow deadlock detector to the Go SDK, similar to the existing implementation in the Java SDK. This feature would help developers identify and prevent workflows from getting stuck due to deadlock conditions.

issues.title: sticky cache: fix resource leaks on worker.Stop()
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: Sticky cache is leaked when a worker stops, causing memory and goroutine leaks. The issue stems from using a global singleton cache that can't be properly cleaned up when multiple workers share it. The fix is to create a per-worker sticky cache and purge it completely on worker.Stop().

issues.title: Make TestWorkflowEnvironment support test multiple workflows
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: TestWorkflowEnvironment currently only supports testing multiple workflows in parent-child relationships. The feature request is to extend it to support testing independent workflows that are not parent-child related.

issues.title: Context used for ExecuteActivity is ignored or SideEffect ignores parameters
issues.author: samarabbas
issues.summary: ExecuteActivity context parameters are being ignored when SideEffect is called multiple times with different contexts. The activity receives an ID generated from the wrong context instead of the explicitly passed one.

issues.title: Change client.NewClient signature
issues.author: alexshtin
issues.summary: Simplify NewClient API signature to accept hostPort and domain directly instead of requiring callers to manually construct gRPC connections. The change hides complexity, allows mandatory interceptors and default load balancing configuration, and provides cleaner API ergonomics.

issues.title: Remove path prefix from activity and workflow type names
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Workflow and activity type names currently include the full package path prefix (e.g., `go.temporal.io/temporal/internal.splitJoinActivityWorkflow`), which makes it difficult to move workflows between directories and requires manual string naming. The proposal is to remove the path prefix and use only the simple name (e.g., `splitJoinActivityWorkflow`).

issues.title: Add support for cross namespace activity and child workflow scheduling
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Add support for scheduling activities and child workflows across namespace boundaries in the Go SDK. Currently works on single clusters but breaks when cross-datacenter features are enabled.

issues.title: Add ability to pass configuration to a workflow
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: Add ability to pass configuration to workflows safely without breaking determinism. Currently there's no clean way to share configuration with workflows that isn't passed as arguments or through unsafe context propagators.

issues.title: Fix context propagation in testsuite
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: The testsuite requires headers to be injected directly into WorkflowTestSuite instead of using context propagators. A new setContext() method is needed to read headers from context using configured ContextPropagators, and context propagation to child workflows appears broken in the testsuite.

issues.title: Pass function result by pointer to the DataConverter for consistency
issues.author: mfateev
issues.summary: DataConverter.fromData should receive function results as pointers instead of by value for consistency with how arguments are deserialized.
